Perfect for towing, it delivers real-time data for peace of mind, safety, and efficiency."",""description"":""The Edge Insight CTS3 is the #1 selling digital monitor in the diesel industry, delivering unmatched visibility into your truck’s performance. Built with a sleek 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen, the Insight CTS3 eliminates the need for expensive mechanical gauges by consolidating dozens of parameters into one easy-to-use, fully customizable display. Designed for both daily drivers and performance enthusiasts, the CTS3 provides real-time data on boost, EGTs, transmission temperature, fuel rail pressure, and more, while also allowing you to read and clear trouble codes with ease.

What sets the Insight CTS3 apart is its broad compatibility across all platforms. Whether you own a Ram Cummins, GM Duramax, or Ford Power Stroke, F150, V8 Silverado or something else the CTS3 integrates seamlessly through the OBD-II port to track and display critical engine parameters. The system’s intuitive swipe interface makes it simple to configure your own gauge layouts, switch between day and night modes, and even set up alerts to protect your engine under heavy load or extreme conditions. With built-in data logging and easy Wi-Fi updates, the Insight CTS3 ensures your monitor always stays current with the latest features and capabilities.

Trusted by thousands of diesel owners, the Edge Insight CTS3 remains the go-to choice for those who demand precision monitoring, sleek design, and industry-leading performance. Whether you’re towing, racing, or just keeping an eye on your truck’s health, the Insight CTS3 delivers the information you need when you need it column2: Instructions - insight-cts3-manual.pdf", Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,5,Emissions,"This part is legal for sale or use on Emissions Controlled Vehicles, Uncontrolled (Non-Emissions Controlled) Vehicles, and Racing Use Only Vehicles because it does not affect vehicle emissions and is not covered by emissions regulations.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Insight CTS3 is the #1 selling digital monitor in the diesel industry, delivering unmatched visibility into your truck’s performance. Built with a sleek 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen, the Insight CTS3 eliminates the need for expensive mechanical gauges by consolidating dozens of parameters into one easy-to-use, fully customizable display. Designed for both daily drivers and performance enthusiasts, the CTS3 provides real-time data on boost, EGTs, transmission temperature, fuel rail pressure, and more, while also allowing you to read and clear trouble codes with ease.

column1: What sets the Insight CTS3 apart is its broad compatibility across all platforms. Whether you own a Ram Cummins, GM Duramax, or Ford Power Stroke, F150, V8 Silverado or something else the CTS3 integrates seamlessly through the OBD-II port to track and display critical engine parameters. The system’s intuitive swipe interface makes it simple to configure your own gauge layouts, switch between day and night modes, and even set up alerts to protect your engine under heavy load or extreme conditions. With built-in data logging and easy Wi-Fi updates, the Insight CTS3 ensures your monitor always stays current with the latest features and capabilities.

Trusted by thousands of diesel owners, the Edge Insight CTS3 remains the go-to choice for those who demand precision monitoring, sleek design, and industry-leading performance. Whether you’re towing, racing, or just keeping an eye on your truck’s health, the Insight CTS3 delivers the information you need when you need it most.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",VEHICLE SPECIFIC ATTRIBUTES,SPECS,EMISSIONS,5,TECH RESOURCES,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Evolution CTS3 for Duramax"",""partnumber"":""85400-200"",""upc"":""810009939900"",""shortdescription"":""The Evolution CTS3 for GM Duramax delivers powerful tuning, a sleek touchscreen, and real-time engine monitoring. Boost towing power, throttle response, and efficiency with this premium all-in-one tuner and performance upgrade."",""description"":""Give your 2001–2016 Chevy Silverado or GMC Sierra Duramax the ultimate performance upgrade with the Edge Evolution CTS3, a tuner and monitor that redefines what your truck is capable of. Engineered for the 6.6L Duramax platform, the CTS3 delivers proven horsepower and torque gains that make towing, hauling, and daily driving more powerful and efficient. Suporting LB7, LLY, LBZ, LMM and LML trucks you can see gains of up to +120 horsepower and +200 lb-ft of torque. These calibrations optimize drivability by improving throttle response, reducing downshifting under load, and giving you the confidence to handle heavy trailers or steep grades with ease.

The Evolution CTS3 doesn’t stop at tuning power—it also features a sleek, full-color 5-inch touchscreen monitor that transforms your cab into a digital command center. With customizable gauge layouts, real-time monitoring of boost, EGTs, transmission temperature, and more, plus data logging and built-in diagnostics, you’ll have complete insight into your truck’s performance at all times. The intuitive swipe interface makes navigation simple, while Wi-Fi capability ensures your software stays updated with the latest features.

Best of all, the Evolution CTS3 is 50-state emissions compliant, meaning you can enjoy safe, reliable power without compromising on environmental standards or legal requirements. Backed by Edge Products’ industry-leading innovation and support, the Evolution CTS3 is the perfect choice for Duramax owners who want maximum power, optimized towing, and total control—all in one powerful, easy-to-use California Air Resources Board (CARB) Executive Order (EO) number.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Give your 2001–2016 Chevy Silverado or GMC Sierra Duramax the ultimate performance upgrade with the Edge Evolution CTS3, a tuner and monitor that redefines what your truck is capable of. Engineered for the 6.6L Duramax platform, the CTS3 delivers proven horsepower and torque gains that make towing, hauling, and daily driving more powerful and efficient. Suporting LB7, LLY, LBZ, LMM and LML trucks you can see gains of up to +120 horsepower and +200 lb-ft of torque. These calibrations optimize drivability by improving throttle response, reducing downshifting under load, and giving you the confidence to handle heavy trailers or steep grades with ease.

column1: The Evolution CTS3 doesn’t stop at tuning power—it also features a sleek, full-color 5-inch touchscreen monitor that transforms your cab into a digital command center. With customizable gauge layouts, real-time monitoring of boost, EGTs, transmission temperature, and more, plus data logging and built-in diagnostics, you’ll have complete insight into your truck’s performance at all times. The intuitive swipe interface makes navigation simple, while Wi-Fi capability ensures your software stays updated with the latest features.

Best of all, the Evolution CTS3 is 50-state emissions compliant, meaning you can enjoy safe, reliable power without compromising on environmental standards or legal requirements. Backed by Edge Products’ industry-leading innovation and support, the Evolution CTS3 is the perfect choice for Duramax owners who want maximum power, optimized towing, and total control—all in one powerful, easy-to-use package.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

,{""name"":""Pulsar LT for 2019-2022 GM Gas Trucks"",""partnumber"":""22451"",""upc"":""810009939429"",""shortdescription"":""Unlock full control of your GM truck with the Pulsar LT! Adjust throttle response, tire size, gear ratio, and disable AFM/DFM, no tuning or tools needed. Plug-and-play power, performance, and precision for your Silverado, Sierra, or SUV."",""description"":""Take command of your GM truck’s performance with the Pulsar LT, the ultimate inline control module designed for late-model GM applications. Engineered for seamless integration, the Pulsar LT installs directly into your vehicle’s computer system, no tuning, no permanent modifications, and no hassle. With this innovative device, you can adjust throttle response, tire size, gear ratio, TPMS settings, and even enable or disable features like Active Fuel Management (AFM) or Dynamic Fuel Management (DFM) in seconds.

Perfect for Silverado, Sierra, Tahoe, Suburban, Colorado, and Yukon owners, the Pulsar LT delivers a new level of customization without voiding your factory warranty. Easily recalibrate your truck for larger tires or gear changes, optimize fuel efficiency, or unleash sharper throttle response for a more engaging driving experience. The on-the-fly adjustability and plug-and-play design make it one of the most versatile upgrades available for GM trucks.

Whether you’re towing, off-roading, or simply cruising, the Pulsar LT ensures your truck performs exactly the way you want it to. Experience smoother shifts, improved drivability, and full control of your vehicle’s key functions all without a complex installation.

*Note - 2022 refreshed models are not supported. The 12th digit of the VIN will verify this, if it is 5 or higher, the Pulsar LT will not work. 4 and lower are supported for the 2022 model year.

*When physically changing ring and pinion gears in the late model GM trucks, the factory cruise control will be disabled. While the Pulsar will allow you to recalibrate the speedometer for that gear change, it will not re-activate the disabled cruise control system or correct any codes that are set. GM has this feature laced into the calibration files and would require full ECM/TCM tuning to re-enable cruise control or to correct any other codes or drivability I also love the throttle sensitivity adjustment, it really makes the 5.3 respond like the 6.2."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-12-15 00:51:39"",""updateddate"":""December 15, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""22451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":2094,""customerid"":270647,""firstname"":""Stephen"",""lastname"":""Chenier"",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""December 6, 2020"",""title"":""Just what I was looking for"",""reviewtext"":""Long gone are the days of trying to pass a line of vehicles on my way home from work only to hit that factory set speed limiter and have to squeeze in just a few cars back from being first. Pulsar LT allowed me to solve that problem. Not to mention the throttle sensitivity increase and the auto stop disabler, which is good for nothing but killing the starter prematurely in my opinion. I’m 100% satisfied with my purchase. Would be nice to have some performance adjustments but with my Sierra’s 6.2 V8, I think I’m good just the way I am..... I started researching and it does everything I wanted. My top priority was the speed limiter, sorry but I hate that thing. Once installed (which is super easy) I disabled the cylinder deactivation and the truck sounds much better now. I also of course removed the speed limiter and turned off the auto start. It’s nice to jump in the truck and not turn it off every time. Lastly was the throttle sensitivity, I I set mine at the number 3 setting and it feels great, reduced a lot of the throttle lag. If you are on the fence about buying it, don’t be. It’s totally worth it!!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-12-06 14:06:27"",""updateddate"":""December 6, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""22451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":2873,""customerid"":415620,""firstname"":""Jaymiami"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""3"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""May 1, 2021"",""title"":""It's alrite"",""reviewtext"":""The product is good just when u buy it says you have to download new software on to it and I guess u need another cable obd2 and a laptop to upload software and I don't have either a laptop or that cable so it doesn't work properly but it does have better throttle response and I took off the speed limiter the only thing am trying to the off that on off engine start and it doesn't do it I guess thats where the soft ware update comes into play"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-05-01 17:59:54"",""updateddate"":""May 1, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""22451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":2874,""customerid"":415621,""firstname"":""Jkelly1234"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""4"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""April 10, 2021"",""title"":""Does what it says"",""reviewtext"":""Had to wait a few months to get this, so got caught up in the price increase. I new it wasn't a tuner but paid the high price anyway. It does what it says, but after realizing that my truck came with different "" modes "" from the factory and one of them is a sport mode, this wasn't needed at all. The sport factory mode does the same thing this does for throttle response and when the S&B intake already on the truck,  the throttle response is already good. My truck also had a 115 cut off point so the speedometer change wasn't needed. But, for 458 dollars it did turn off the FUEL MANAGEMENT and Auto stop so that was the only positive. Just know, that in MY truck it never showed the truck in V8 or V4 mode so no way to know if this thing worked for that.
So, with that being said it was a waste of money for me. Save your money and wait for the tuner version."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-04-10 13:17:35"",""updateddate"":""April 10, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""22451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":2875,""customerid"":415622,""firstname"":""JBL4"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""May 9, 2021"",""title"":""Great Product"",""reviewtext"":""Bought this product about two months ago and installed on my 2020 GMC 6.2L AT4 immediately. Also added 22x12's and a CAI. Weight of rims made truck sluggish. This thing is like pouring red bull on the gas tank. It really woke my truck up. I had to dial it back to 2 to tame it a little. On 7 it's like driving the Tasmanian devil!! Was able to adjust rim size adjust dfm and turn off auto shutoff."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-08-25 03:33:19"",""updateddate"":""August 25, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""22451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":2890,""customerid"":415636,""firstname"":""Bo Alley"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""May 10, 2022"",""title"":""2020 Silverado LT works as described"",""reviewtext"":""Have had it installed for 2 weeks now.  I wanted to modify 4 parameters: speed limiter, Auto On-Off, DFM and acceleration.  Both  installation and programming was very easy.  I watched a few videos and knew everything by heart before the product arrived.  While I had 2 previous generations of AFM, one a stick shift, the other a 6 speed auto (2010 Silverado) I never really noticed any performance issues with AFM?  However, I never shut it off either..  The 2020 with an 8 speed auto and DFM have very noticeable affects!  What felt like slow-sticky shifts at start and accelerator response was very noticeabletotally absent once I disabled DFM.  
The only thing I am keeping an eye on is milage.  My Avg with DFM was 19.6 city and some highway driving.  With the DFM disabled, milage has dropped to  17.9-18.1.  I may go back to DFM for an upcoming (2+k miles) road trip and take the extra gas milage?  But at least I can modify back to disable in a second."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2022-05-10 00:01:52"",""updateddate"":""May 10, 2022"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""22451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":2891,""customerid"":415637,""firstname"":""red dragon"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""December 2, 2021"",""title"":""I like it so far"",""reviewtext"":""So far its good, gas mileage went down a bit but great performance."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-12-02 16:04:50"",""updateddate"":""December 2, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""22451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":2892,""customerid"":415638,""firstname"":""Derrick l"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""3"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""February 14, 2021"",""title"":""Ok, but no hp gains whatsover"",""reviewtext"":""Pros: fast install, fast setup, stering wheel control'

I am so glad I did!! This product does exactly what it says its going to do, with very simple installation."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-08-25 14:41:06"",""updateddate"":""August 25, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""22451"",""feedback"":[{""customer_id"":446058,""feedback_type"":""helpful""}],""images"":[]},{""id"":2894,""customerid"":415640,""firstname"":""muzzlebrake"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""2"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""December 8, 2020"",""title"":""glitches"",""reviewtext"":""Has had some glitches. On occasion the engine would rev to 3krpm and just hang there. Had to turn off the motor to get it to go back to idle. Second major glitch shiftinginto 4wd the parking brake would hang up and all other functions ceased to work. Shut off engine and would not restart. Had to remove the Pulsar, let the computer reset and then restart and take it back to 2wd, reinstall Pulsar and reprogram. Other than that it works. Adjusted my speed limiter and changed throttle response, Disabled auto start/stop and DFM although on occasion the autostop did not work and motor would shut off at a complete stop.  This device still has some bugs IMO. 2019 Sivlerado High Country 4wd 10 speed 6.2l engine."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-12-08 14:54:45"",""updateddate"":""December 8, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""22451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":2895,""customerid"":415641,""firstname"":""stvnhrmn"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""January 5, 2021"",""title"":""Better than Expected"",""reviewtext"":""I'm a long time DiabloSport tuner (two with Intune I3 and another with the RAM Pulsar) and this one was just SO easy to install and setup by comparison.  I realize it's not a FULL tune but it does what I want, disables DFM and Auto Stop/Start.  The throttle improvements are very nice and I have the added benefit of MUCH smoother deceleration due to the DFM disable.  Didn't expect that but there is nothing about the drivability of my Silverado that wasn't made better by the Pulsar LT!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-01-05 22:09:06"",""updateddate"":""January 5, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""22451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":2896,""customerid"":415642,""firstname"":""Pointman921"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""April 16, 2021"",""title"":""No glitches, easy install and works well!"",""reviewtext"":""I bought this for my 2021 6.2/10 speed.

fit my vehicle?,7,Emissions,"This part is legal under the provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Take command of your GM truck’s performance with the Pulsar LT, the ultimate inline control module designed for late-model GM applications. Engineered for seamless integration, the Pulsar LT installs directly into your vehicle’s computer system, no tuning, no permanent modifications, and no hassle. With this innovative device, you can adjust throttle response, tire size, gear ratio, TPMS settings, and even enable or disable features like Active Fuel Management (AFM) or Dynamic Fuel Management (DFM) in seconds.

column1: Perfect for Silverado, Sierra, Tahoe, Suburban, Colorado, and Yukon owners, the Pulsar LT delivers a new level of customization without voiding your factory warranty. Easily recalibrate your truck for larger tires or gear changes, optimize fuel efficiency, or unleash sharper throttle response for a more engaging driving experience. The on-the-fly adjustability and plug-and-play design make it one of the most versatile upgrades available for GM trucks.

Whether you’re towing, off-roading, or simply cruising, the Pulsar LT ensures your truck performs exactly the way you want it to. Experience smoother shifts, improved drivability, and full control of your vehicle’s key functions all without a complex installation.
*Note - 2022 refreshed models are not supported. The 12th digit of the VIN will verify this, if it is 5 or higher, the Pulsar LT will not work. 4 and lower are supported for the 2022 model year.

*When physically changing ring and pinion gears in the late model GM trucks, the factory cruise control will be disabled. While the Pulsar will allow you to recalibrate the speedometer for that gear change, it will not re-activate the disabled cruise control system or correct any codes that are set. GM has this feature laced into the calibration files and would require full ECM/TCM tuning to re-enable cruise control or to correct any other codes or drivability concerns",About Range Technology,Increase efficiency and performance with Range Technology AFM/DFM and Start Stop devices. column8: Evolution CTS3 for Ford Power Stroke delivers powerful tuning, a sleek touchscreen, and real-time engine monitoring. Boost towing power, throttle response, and efficiency with this premium all-in-one tuner and performance upgrade.

,{""name"":""Evolution CTS3 for Power Stroke"",""partnumber"":""85400-100"",""upc"":""810065210005"",""shortdescription"":""Evolution CTS3 for Ford Power Stroke delivers powerful tuning, a sleek touchscreen, and real-time engine monitoring. Boost towing power, throttle response, and efficiency with this premium all-in-one tuner and performance upgrade."",""description"":""Take your Ford Power Stroke to the next level with the Edge Evolution CTS3, the most advanced in-cabin tuner and digital monitor available for 1999–2019 Ford diesel applications. Built for real truck owners who demand power, reliability, and compliance, the CTS3 offers dyno-proven performance gains, emissions-compliant calibrations, and an industry-leading touchscreen display—all in one sleek device.

The Evolution CTS3 for Ford Diesel comes with CARB Executive Order (EO) approval, making it 50-state legal for use on public roads. Enjoy peace of mind knowing your performance gains meet strict emissions standards without sacrificing power or drivability.

Broad Diesel Coverage

7.3L Power Stroke (1999–2003) – Proven gains for Ford’s legendary workhorse.

6.0L Power Stroke (2003–2007) – Improved drivability, towing confidence, and reliability.

6.4L Power Stroke (2008–2010) – Cleaner, stronger power delivery with optimized fueling.

6.7L Power Stroke (2011–2019) – State-of-the-art tuning for Ford’s modern diesel powerhouse.

Expandability with EAS Accessories

The CTS3 isn’t just a tuner—it’s a modular digital gauge platform. With the Edge Accessory System (EAS), you can expand monitoring capabilities to fit your exact needs. Add sensors like:

EGT Pyrometer Kits – Keep exhaust temps in check when towing or running higher power levels.

Pressure Sensors – Monitor boost, fuel, or oil pressure for added safety and performance insight.

Temperature Sensors – Track temps in vital components like transmission fluid, differential, or engine oil. The EAS system plugs directly into the CTS3, allowing you to daisy-chain multiple sensors and display them in real time on the touchscreen.

The Evolution CTS3 for Ford Diesel is more than just a tuner—it’s an all-in-one performance upgrade, gauge cluster, and diagnostic tool that transforms the way you drive your Power Stroke. With tuning that’s emissions-compliant, dyno-proven, and tailored to Ford’s most popular diesel platforms, the CTS3 is the smart choice for truck owners who want legal power and total control.

Compatible with 1999–2019 Ford Super Duty trucks equipped with 7.3L, 6.0L, 6.4L, and 6.7L Power Stroke Diesel because it has a California Air Resources Board (CARB) Executive Order (EO) number.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Take your Ford Power Stroke to the next level with the Edge Evolution CTS3, the most advanced in-cabin tuner and digital monitor available for 1999–2019 Ford diesel applications. Built for real truck owners who demand power, reliability, and compliance, the CTS3 offers dyno-proven performance gains, emissions-compliant calibrations, and an industry-leading touchscreen display—all in one sleek device.

column1: The Evolution CTS3 for Ford Diesel comes with CARB Executive Order (EO) approval, making it 50-state legal for use on public roads. Enjoy peace of mind knowing your performance gains meet strict emissions standards without sacrificing power or drivability.
7.3L Power Stroke (1999–2003) – Proven gains for Ford’s legendary workhorse.
6.0L Power Stroke (2003–2007) – Improved drivability, towing confidence, and reliability.
6.4L Power Stroke (2008–2010) – Cleaner, stronger power delivery with optimized fueling.
6.7L Power Stroke (2011–2019) – State-of-the-art tuning for Ford’s modern diesel powerhouse.
The CTS3 isn’t just a tuner—it’s a modular digital gauge platform. With the Edge Accessory System (EAS), you can expand monitoring capabilities to fit your exact needs. Add sensors like:
EGT Pyrometer Kits – Keep exhaust temps in check when towing or running higher power levels.
Pressure Sensors – Monitor boost, fuel, or oil pressure for added safety and performance insight.

Temperature Sensors – Track temps in vital components like transmission fluid, differential, or engine oil. The EAS system plugs directly into the CTS3, allowing you to daisy-chain multiple sensors and display them in real time on the touchscreen.

The Evolution CTS3 for Ford Diesel is more than just a tuner—it’s an all-in-one performance upgrade, gauge cluster, and diagnostic tool that transforms the way you drive your Power Stroke. With tuning that’s emissions-compliant, dyno-proven, and tailored to Ford’s most popular diesel platforms, the CTS3 is the smart choice for truck owners who want legal power and total control.

Compatible with 1999–2019 Ford Super Duty trucks equipped with 7.3L, 6.0L, 6.4L, and 6.7L Power Stroke Diesel engines.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

,{""name"":""Evolution CTS3 for Cummins"",""partnumber"":""85400-300"",""upc"":""810065210036"",""shortdescription"":""The Evolution CTS3 for Dodge Ram Cummins delivers powerful tuning, a sleek touchscreen, and real-time engine monitoring. Boost towing power, throttle response, and efficiency with this premium all-in-one tuner and performance upgrade."",""description"":""Unlock the true potential of your 2003–2012 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 Cummins with the Edge Products Evolution CTS3, the most advanced in-cab tuner and digital monitor available. Designed specifically for the legendary 5.9L and 6.7L Cummins engines, the Evolution CTS3 delivers dyno-proven horsepower and torque gains that transform your Ram into a towing and performance powerhouse. With calibrations offering up to +120 horsepower and +315 lb-ft of torque on the 5.9L and as much as +100 horsepower and +210 lb-ft of torque on the 6.7L, this tuner gives you the extra pulling power, throttle response, and drivability you’ve been looking for—whether you’re towing heavy loads, hauling equipment, or daily driving.

Beyond performance, the CTS3 stands out with its sleek, high-resolution 5-inch touchscreen display, making it easy to monitor critical parameters like boost, EGTs, transmission temperature, and fuel rail pressure in real time. The customizable interface allows you to set up gauge layouts, performance alerts, and even data logging for detailed tracking. Built-in diagnostics let you read and clear DTCs without a trip to the shop, and Wi-Fi compatibility ensures your device always stays up to date.

Best of all, the Evolution CTS3 is 50-state emissions compliant, giving you the confidence to run powerful, efficient, and legal tuning no matter where you drive. Backed by Edge Products’ reputation for innovation and reliability, the Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate upgrade for Cummins owners who demand more power, better towing, and complete insight into their California Air Resources Board (CARB) Executive Order (EO) number.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Unlock the true potential of your 2003–2012 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 Cummins with the Edge Products Evolution CTS3, the most advanced in-cab tuner and digital monitor available. Designed specifically for the legendary 5.9L and 6.7L Cummins engines, the Evolution CTS3 delivers dyno-proven horsepower and torque gains that transform your Ram into a towing and performance powerhouse. With calibrations offering up to +120 horsepower and +315 lb-ft of torque on the 5.9L and as much as +100 horsepower and +210 lb-ft of torque on the 6.7L, this tuner gives you the extra pulling power, throttle response, and drivability you’ve been looking for—whether you’re towing heavy loads, hauling equipment, or daily driving.

column1: Beyond performance, the CTS3 stands out with its sleek, high-resolution 5-inch touchscreen display, making it easy to monitor critical parameters like boost, EGTs, transmission temperature, and fuel rail pressure in real time. The customizable interface allows you to set up gauge layouts, performance alerts, and even data logging for detailed tracking. Built-in diagnostics let you read and clear DTCs without a trip to the shop, and Wi-Fi compatibility ensures your device always stays up to date.

Best of all, the Evolution CTS3 is 50-state emissions compliant, giving you the confidence to run powerful, efficient, and legal tuning no matter where you drive. Backed by Edge Products’ reputation for innovation and reliability, the Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate upgrade for Cummins owners who demand more power, better towing, and complete insight into their truck’s performance.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

,{""name"":""EZX Module"",""partnumber"":""32710"",""upc"":""810065212702"",""shortdescription"":""2019-2024 Ram 2500/3500 Cummins 2019-2024 Ram Cab & Chassis 3500/4500/5500"",""description"":""The Edge EZX is the ultimate plug-and-play performance upgrade for your 2019–2024 Ram 6.7L Cummins, delivering safe, reliable power gains and advanced functionality engineered for both daily drivers and heavy towing applications. Designed to maximize efficiency while staying emissions-compliant, the EZX unlocks additional horsepower and torque right where you need it most—improving throttle response, drivability, and pulling power without sacrificing reliability. Whether you’re towing a camper, hauling equipment, or just looking for stronger all-around performance, the EZX enhances your truck’s capabilities with confidence.

Unlike traditional tuners, the EZX module installs in minutes with no cutting or splicing, integrating seamlessly with your Cummins through factory connections. Once installed, you’ll experience emissions-safe power gains optimized for real-world driving and towing. Multiple adjustable power levels let you fine-tune performance for your needs—whether you want maximum efficiency for commuting or extra torque for heavy loads.

In addition to added power, the EZX offers advanced features that improve your driving experience. You can recalibrate for tire size and axle gear changes, adjust throttle sensitivity to eliminate lag, and monitor key parameters through your truck’s factory display when paired with the optional Edge EZX app. Combined with Edge’s focus on durability and emissions compliance, the 32710 gives Cummins owners a performance solution that is both powerful and worry-free.

Engineered for those who demand more from their truck, the Edge EZX transforms your Ram Cummins into a more capable, efficient, and enjoyable machine—perfect for towing, hauling, and everyday driving.

Now supports 2019-2024 Ram Cab & Chassis. 3500/4500/5500 platforms with gains as much as +46hp/120tq

*When paired with the Insight CTS3 in kit form, the two devices still work independently of each other, and the Insight CTS3 will be used for monitoring only, all EZX control is still accomplished via the smartphone app and steering wheel."",""metadescription"":null,""productnotes"":"""",""installationnotes"":""If running an aftermarket intake system, and a check engine light is experienced under heavy load or throttle, the EZX MAF harness can be disconnected and left un-used as the performance intake is already making the requested changes in airflow and the EZX MAF inputs are not needed. dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge EZX is the ultimate plug-and-play performance upgrade for your 2019–2024 Ram 6.7L Cummins, delivering safe, reliable power gains and advanced functionality engineered for both daily drivers and heavy towing applications. Designed to maximize efficiency while staying emissions-compliant, the EZX unlocks additional horsepower and torque right where you need it most—improving throttle response, drivability, and pulling power without sacrificing reliability. Whether you’re towing a camper, hauling equipment, or just looking for stronger all-around performance, the EZX enhances your truck’s capabilities with confidence.

column1: Unlike traditional tuners, the EZX module installs in minutes with no cutting or splicing, integrating seamlessly with your Cummins through factory connections. Once installed, you’ll experience emissions-safe power gains optimized for real-world driving and towing. Multiple adjustable power levels let you fine-tune performance for your needs—whether you want maximum efficiency for commuting or extra torque for heavy loads.

In addition to added power, the EZX offers advanced features that improve your driving experience. You can recalibrate for tire size and axle gear changes, adjust throttle sensitivity to eliminate lag, and monitor key parameters through your truck’s factory display when paired with the optional Edge EZX app. Combined with Edge’s focus on durability and emissions compliance, the 32710 gives Cummins owners a performance solution that is both powerful and worry-free.

Engineered for those who demand more from their truck, the Edge EZX transforms your Ram Cummins into a more capable, efficient, and enjoyable machine—perfect for towing, hauling, and everyday driving.
Now supports 2019-2024 Ram Cab & Chassis. 3500/4500/5500 platforms with gains as much as +46hp/120tq

*When paired with the Insight CTS3 in kit form, the two devices still work independently of each other, and the Insight CTS3 will be used for monitoring only, all EZX control is still accomplished via the smartphone app and steering wheel.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Edge Evolution CTS3"",""partnumber"":""85450-250"",""upc"":""810009939924"",""shortdescription"":""1999-2016 GM Vehicles - Gas"",""description"":""The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the most advanced flash tuner and digital monitor available for GM gas applications, delivering proven performance and control for Silverado, Sierra, Tahoe, Suburban, and Yukon models equipped with 5.3L, 6.0L, and 6.2L engines. Featuring the industry’s best 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen monitor, the CTS3 combines preloaded, emissions-compliant calibrations with a fully customizable display, giving you noticeable gains in horsepower, torque, and drivability for towing, fuel economy, daily driving, or performance.

The CTS3 goes far beyond basic tuning. It offers powerful adjustable features including tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustments, and the ability to disable GM’s DOD/AFM system, eliminating unwanted cylinder deactivation for smoother performance and reliability. Built-in diagnostics let you read and clear DTCs on the fly. With an intuitive swipe interface and Wi-Fi update support, staying current with the latest features is effortless.

Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the most advanced flash tuner and digital monitor available for GM gas applications, delivering proven performance and control for Silverado, Sierra, Tahoe, Suburban, and Yukon models equipped with 5.3L, 6.0L, and 6.2L engines. Featuring the industry’s best 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen monitor, the CTS3 combines preloaded, emissions-compliant calibrations with a fully customizable display, giving you noticeable gains in horsepower, torque, and drivability for towing, fuel economy, daily driving, or performance.

column1: The CTS3 goes far beyond basic tuning. It offers powerful adjustable features including tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustments, and the ability to disable GM’s DOD/AFM system, eliminating unwanted cylinder deactivation for smoother performance and reliability. Built-in diagnostics let you read and clear DTCs on the fly. With an intuitive swipe interface and Wi-Fi update support, staying current with the latest features is effortless.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of tuning expertise, the Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate upgrade for GM gas truck and SUV owners who want safe, reliable performance gains, superior monitoring, and full control of their vehicle’s capabilities, all in one sleek device.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

column1: This is our most popular EAS accessory and allows the average diesel truck owner to monitor Exhaust Gas Temperatures from their device on the dash. The external temperature probe must be installed in the exhaust manifold for the most accurate temperature readings. The closer to the combustion chamber, the better. Most applications will require the manifold be drilled and tapped to 1/8-NPT (bit and tap not included). Manifold fitting, probe, wiring, and EAS starter cable is included.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,TECH RESOURCES,,,,,,,,,,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""EZ for 2024-2025 GM L5P Duramax"",""partnumber"":""20202"",""upc"":""810065218728"",""shortdescription"":""Edge EZ for 2024–2025 GM L5P Duramax adds emissions-safe power, throttle response & towing confidence. Plug-and-play, no-trace, 50-state legal module"",""description"":""The Edge EZ for 2024–2025 GM 6.6L L5P Duramax is the simplest and most effective way to add reliable power, improved throttle response, and towing confidence to your Silverado or Sierra HD. This plug-and-play module installs in minutes using factory connections, with no cutting, splicing, or complicated tuning required. Just plug it in, select your power level, and enjoy the difference. When removed, the EZ leaves no trace, making it a warranty friendly performance solution that gives you power when you want it and factory stock settings when you don’t.

Engineered with emissions safe calibrations, the EZ is 50-state legal, delivering peace of mind no matter where you drive. Designed specifically for real world applications, it provides smooth, usable horsepower and torque gains that shine in towing and daily driving scenarios. Whether you’re pulling a heavy trailer up steep grades or navigating city traffic, the EZ gives your Duramax the extra response and pulling power you need without sacrificing reliability.

The EZ also offers on-the-fly adjustability, allowing you to switch power levels instantly from the driver’s seat through the Edge EZ smartphone app. This added flexibility lets you fine tune performance for efficiency, towing, or maximum output at the touch of a button. Backed by Edge’s proven engineering, the EZ for L5P Duramax is the perfect upgrade for drivers who want power, drivability, and compliance in one plug-and-play Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge EZ for 2024–2025 GM 6.6L L5P Duramax is the simplest and most effective way to add reliable power, improved throttle response, and towing confidence to your Silverado or Sierra HD. This plug-and-play module installs in minutes using factory connections, with no cutting, splicing, or complicated tuning required. Just plug it in, select your power level, and enjoy the difference. When removed, the EZ leaves no trace, making it a warranty friendly performance solution that gives you power when you want it and factory stock settings when you don’t.

column1: Engineered with emissions safe calibrations, the EZ is 50-state legal, delivering peace of mind no matter where you drive. Designed specifically for real world applications, it provides smooth, usable horsepower and torque gains that shine in towing and daily driving scenarios. Whether you’re pulling a heavy trailer up steep grades or navigating city traffic, the EZ gives your Duramax the extra response and pulling power you need without sacrificing reliability.

The EZ also offers on-the-fly adjustability, allowing you to switch power levels instantly from the driver’s seat through the Edge EZ smartphone app. This added flexibility lets you fine tune performance for efficiency, towing, or maximum output at the touch of a button. Backed by Edge’s proven engineering, the EZ for L5P Duramax is the perfect upgrade for drivers who want power, drivability, and compliance in one plug-and-play package.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

column8: Insight CTS3 is the industry’s #1 preferred display for trucks, offering premium touchscreen monitoring, advanced diagnostics and customizable gauges. Perfect for towing, it delivers real-time data for peace of mind, safety, and efficiency.

Insight CTS3 is the industry’s #1 preferred display for trucks, offering premium touchscreen monitoring, advanced diagnostics and customizable gauges. Perfect for towing, it delivers real-time data for peace of mind, safety, and efficiency.

column32:
,{""name"":""Factory Refurbished Insight CTS3"",""partnumber"":""FR84130-3"",""upc"":""810065218537"",""shortdescription"":""Insight CTS3 is the industry’s #1 preferred display for trucks, offering premium touchscreen monitoring, advanced diagnostics and customizable gauges. Perfect for towing, it delivers real-time data for peace of mind, safety, and efficiency."",""description"":""The Edge Insight CTS3 is the #1 selling digital monitor in the diesel industry, delivering unmatched visibility into your truck’s performance. Built with a sleek 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen, the Insight CTS3 eliminates the need for expensive mechanical gauges by consolidating dozens of parameters into one easy-to-use, fully customizable display. Designed for both daily drivers and performance enthusiasts, the CTS3 provides real-time data on boost, EGTs, transmission temperature, fuel rail pressure, and more, while also allowing you to read and clear trouble codes with ease.

What sets the Insight CTS3 apart is its broad compatibility with diesel and gas trucks. Whether you own a Ram Cummins, GM Duramax, or Ford Power Stroke, the CTS3 integrates seamlessly through the OBD-II port to track and display critical engine parameters. The system’s intuitive swipe interface makes it simple to configure your own gauge layouts, switch between day and night modes, and even set up alerts to protect your engine under heavy load or extreme conditions. With built-in data logging and easy Wi-Fi updates, the Insight CTS3 ensures your monitor always stays current with the latest features and capabilities.

Trusted by thousands of diesel owners, the Edge Insight CTS3 remains the go-to choice for those who demand precision monitoring, sleek design, and industry-leading performance. Whether you’re towing, racing, or just keeping an eye on your truck’s health, the Insight CTS3 delivers the information you need when you need it most."",""metadescription"":null,""productnotes"":"""",""installationnotes"":""*Factory refurbished devices have been rebuilt by our trained technicians and certified with a 90-day warranty. vehicle?,,,,,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Insight CTS3 is the #1 selling digital monitor in the diesel industry, delivering unmatched visibility into your truck’s performance. Built with a sleek 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen, the Insight CTS3 eliminates the need for expensive mechanical gauges by consolidating dozens of parameters into one easy-to-use, fully customizable display. Designed for both daily drivers and performance enthusiasts, the CTS3 provides real-time data on boost, EGTs, transmission temperature, fuel rail pressure, and more, while also allowing you to read and clear trouble codes with ease.

column1: What sets the Insight CTS3 apart is its broad compatibility with diesel and gas trucks. Whether you own a Ram Cummins, GM Duramax, or Ford Power Stroke, the CTS3 integrates seamlessly through the OBD-II port to track and display critical engine parameters. The system’s intuitive swipe interface makes it simple to configure your own gauge layouts, switch between day and night modes, and even set up alerts to protect your engine under heavy load or extreme conditions. With built-in data logging and easy Wi-Fi updates, the Insight CTS3 ensures your monitor always stays current with the latest features and capabilities.

Trusted by thousands of diesel owners, the Edge Insight CTS3 remains the go-to choice for those who demand precision monitoring, sleek design, and industry-leading performance. Whether you’re towing, racing, or just keeping an eye on your truck’s health, the Insight CTS3 delivers the information you need when you need it most.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,TECH RESOURCES,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""EZ with Insight CTS3 for 2024-2025 GM L5P Duramax"",""partnumber"":""20202-3"",""upc"":""850058611549"",""shortdescription"":""Edge EZ for 2024–2025 GM L5P Duramax adds emissions-safe power, throttle response & towing confidence. Plug-and-play, no-trace, 50-state legal module"",""description"":""The Edge EZ for 2024–2025 GM 6.6L L5P Duramax is the simplest and most effective way to add reliable power, improved throttle response, and towing confidence to your Silverado or Sierra HD. This plug-and-play module installs in minutes using factory connections, with no cutting, splicing, or complicated tuning required. Just plug it in, select your power level, and enjoy the difference. When removed, the EZ leaves no trace, making it a warranty friendly performance solution that gives you power when you want it and factory stock settings when you don’t.

Engineered with emissions safe calibrations, the EZ is 50-state legal, delivering peace of mind no matter where you drive. Designed specifically for real world applications, it provides smooth, usable horsepower and torque gains that shine in towing and daily driving scenarios. Whether you’re pulling a heavy trailer up steep grades or navigating city traffic, the EZ gives your Duramax the extra response and pulling power you need without sacrificing reliability.

The EZ also offers on-the-fly adjustability, allowing you to switch power levels instantly from the driver’s seat through the Edge EZ smartphone app. This added flexibility lets you fine tune performance for efficiency, towing, or maximum output at the touch of a button. Backed by Edge’s proven engineering, the EZ for L5P Duramax is the perfect upgrade for drivers who want power, drivability, and compliance in one plug-and-play California Air Resources Board (CARB) Executive Order (EO) number.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge EZ for 2024–2025 GM 6.6L L5P Duramax is the simplest and most effective way to add reliable power, improved throttle response, and towing confidence to your Silverado or Sierra HD. This plug-and-play module installs in minutes using factory connections, with no cutting, splicing, or complicated tuning required. Just plug it in, select your power level, and enjoy the difference. When removed, the EZ leaves no trace, making it a warranty friendly performance solution that gives you power when you want it and factory stock settings when you don’t.

column1: Engineered with emissions safe calibrations, the EZ is 50-state legal, delivering peace of mind no matter where you drive. Designed specifically for real world applications, it provides smooth, usable horsepower and torque gains that shine in towing and daily driving scenarios. Whether you’re pulling a heavy trailer up steep grades or navigating city traffic, the EZ gives your Duramax the extra response and pulling power you need without sacrificing reliability.

The EZ also offers on-the-fly adjustability, allowing you to switch power levels instantly from the driver’s seat through the Edge EZ smartphone app. This added flexibility lets you fine tune performance for efficiency, towing, or maximum output at the touch of a button. Backed by Edge’s proven engineering, the EZ for L5P Duramax is the perfect upgrade for drivers who want power, drivability, and compliance in one plug-and-play package.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,submodel,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Edge Juice w/ Attitude CTS3"",""partnumber"":""31501-3"",""upc"":""810065210166"",""shortdescription"":""2001-2002 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 - 5.9L Cummins Diesel"",""description"":""The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

column1: What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and control.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

column15:
,{""name"":""Holley Sniper EFI BBD Master Kit for 1971-1986 Jeep CJ - Shiny"",""partnumber"":""550-858K"",""upc"":""090127057292"",""shortdescription"":""Supports Up To 350 HP - 3.5 in. Handheld Monitor - Return Fuel System"",""description"":""Now that you're beginning your EFI journey, you don't have to stop here! Sniper is apart of a complete ecosystem designed specifically to work together and support all of your EFI needs. This kit pair's seamlessly together with plug-n-play Hyperspark Ignition systems (coil, ignition box and distributors), fuel system's (fuel pump kits, modules, in-tank systems), air cleaners & digital dashes to unlock the full potential of your build.

You don't have to be a tuning genius or computer wiz to convert your build to EFI. Our simple calibration wizard allows you to just answer a few questions about your engine and the system will begin self-tuning with no laptop required. Use the high resolution 3.5"" full color touchscreen for tuning and gauge displays.

Introducing the Sniper EFI BBD Master Kit, for Jeep CJ's! The Sniper EFI BBD will be right at home on any 258ci powered trail rig, or weekend cruiser. Not only does the Sniper EFI BBD offer superior throttle response and WOT power over the carburetor, but you can also gain timing control! Put an end to cold start issues, hesitations, vapor lock, and flooding. Upgrade to Sniper EFI and get the tactical accuracy of EFI today!

The Sniper BBD Master Kit includes a complete fuel system consisting of; 20ft of 3/8"" vapor guard fuel hose, fuel pump, filters, and all necessary hardware to return fuel into your tank. Additionally, you're getting a 4.9 wideband oxygen sensor with a leak free oxygen sensor, oem style TPS/IAC, fuel pressure regulator, all Stainless Steel T-Bolt clamps and a Stainless Steel weldable 27, 2020"",""title"":""Awesome!"",""reviewtext"":""I installed this kit on my 1983 CJ7 with the 258 (4.2L). I installed the HyperSpark system as well as this injection system. WOW!! What a difference!! It woke that engine up! This is the ORIGINAL engine and has not been rebuilt. Great compression on all cylinders and passed a leak-down test. No smoke and does not use oil. So this made it a great candidate for these systems. 
It feels like I dropped a gear size! Mine has the 2.73 AMC axle and 33 inch tires and it was a dog! I was thinking about going with a V8 but I am trying to keep it all original as this was a restoration.
I can't say enough about how great this system is. Installed easy, but it may not be for the backyard mechanic. I trashed the original Carter BBD some time ago and went with the 32/36 Webber carb, it was better, but still had cold start and idle issues. This solved all of that!! 
My Jeep has the original 20 gallon tank (was an option in '83) so I was not able to use the in-tank pump. If yours has the 15 gallon, I HIGHLY recommend it. It's much quieter and you will get longer pump life as it runs cooler. 
Bring your old CJ into the modern age and install this and the HyperSpark system, you will not be sorry you did! 
Get the interface cable that Holley offers. You will want that to use with the free tuning software from Holley. The per-installed timing curve will need some work and you will need it to adjust that curve. You will also need it to perform updates and to ""back-up"" your learned tune and your custom timing curve. I wish I could post pics but there is no option for that here. Looks great installed and you can use your factory air cleaner if you choose.
Thanks Holley for filling this niche!!  "",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-05-27 19:27:16"",""updateddate"":""May 27, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""550-858K"",""feedback"":[{""customer_id"":188344,""feedback_type"":""helpful""},{""customer_id"":207700,""feedback_type"":""helpful""},{""customer_id"":211418,""feedback_type"":""helpful""}],""images"":[]},{""id"":7469,""customerid"":316179,""firstname"":""Clinton J"",""lastname"":""Bonnell"",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""February 17, 2024"",""title"":""It’ll run a 4.0l too with no problem!"",""reviewtext"":""I transplanted a 1987 rebuilt Renix era 4.0l engine into my 1985 CJ7. It bolted right up without adapters to the T-176 transsmission and motor mounts. I used the old Jeep/ AMC 4.2l air intake and reinstalled my Holley Sniper EFI BBD with Hyperspark. I did adjust the Sniper programming to reflect a 242 cid instead of 258 but kept everything else unchanged. It rumbled to life on the first crank and sounds amazing! Now I just got to get the old girl painted!!!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2024-02-17 17:41:02"",""updateddate"":""February 17, 2024"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""550-858K"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[{""filename"":""4469491895d01cb72d551d57735780920957c73d.jpeg"",""alias"":""IMG_4262.jpeg""},{""filename"":""4e82cd4d07e38a819bad98f91a2ff8ab77db30dc.jpeg"",""alias"":""IMG_4255.jpeg""},{""filename"":""84698a1f01cea66f229c649016f5c79f9e0afb81.jpeg"",""alias"":""IMG_4260.jpeg""}]}],""hts_codes"":{""US"":""8511.90.6040""},""transportMethodRestriction"":null,""addon"":[],""defaultcategory"":{""categoryguid"":""06830488-3FED-4039-A117-04CCC02E784A"",""partnumber"":""550-858K"",""defaultcategory"":""true"",""namehierarchy"":""Fuel Systems/Fuel Injection/Sniper EFI/Sniper 1- and 2-Barrel Systems/Sniper EFI BBD for Jeep CJ"",""navnamehierarchy"":""Air & Fuel Delivery/EFI - column2: Instructions - 199r11323.pdf", Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,3,Emissions,,See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Now that you're beginning your EFI journey, you don't have to stop here! Sniper is apart of a complete ecosystem designed specifically to work together and support all of your EFI needs. This kit pair's seamlessly together with plug-n-play Hyperspark Ignition systems (coil, ignition box and distributors), fuel system's (fuel pump kits, modules, in-tank systems), air cleaners & digital dashes to unlock the full potential of your build.

column1: You don't have to be a tuning genius or computer wiz to convert your build to EFI. Our simple calibration wizard allows you to just answer a few questions about your engine and the system will begin self-tuning with no laptop required. Use the high resolution 3.5"" full color touchscreen for tuning and gauge displays.

Introducing the Sniper EFI BBD Master Kit, for Jeep CJ's! The Sniper EFI BBD will be right at home on any 258ci powered trail rig, or weekend cruiser. Not only does the Sniper EFI BBD offer superior throttle response and WOT power over the carburetor, but you can also gain timing control! Put an end to cold start issues, hesitations, vapor lock, and flooding. Upgrade to Sniper EFI and get the tactical accuracy of EFI today!

The Sniper BBD Master Kit includes a complete fuel system consisting of; 20ft of 3/8"" vapor guard fuel hose, fuel pump, filters, and all necessary hardware to return fuel into your tank. Additionally, you're getting a 4.9 wideband oxygen sensor with a leak free oxygen sensor, oem style TPS/IAC, fuel pressure regulator, all Stainless Steel T-Bolt clamps and a Stainless Steel weldable flange.",,,SPECS,SERVICE PARTS,EMISSIONS,3,TECH RESOURCES,Q&A,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Comp Box"",""partnumber"":""30306"",""upc"":""810065216984"",""shortdescription"":""2001-2002 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 - 5.9L Cummins Diesel"",""description"":""The Edge Comp Box 2.0 is the next evolution of diesel performance, engineered as the modern replacement for the legendary Legacy Comp that powered thousands of VP44-equipped trucks for over two decades. Purpose-built for the 1998.5–2002 Dodge Ram 5.9L 24V Cummins, this module is the ultimate solution for drivers who demand maximum performance, power, and complete control. With its proven track record and updated technology, the Comp Box 2.0 delivers huge horsepower and torque gains that make a noticeable difference whether you’re daily driving, hot rodding, or pushing your truck to the limits at the track.

Installation is fast and simple thanks to its true plug-and-play design—no cutting, no splicing, and no complicated setup required. The module works seamlessly with your VP44 fuel system and supports everything from big injectors to larger turbos, making it the ideal choice for both street trucks and full-blown competition builds. With the new Edge smartphone app integration, you gain real-time control over your fuel curves and tuning adjustments directly from your mobile device. This means you can fine-tune your Cummins on the fly, adapting instantly to changing setups and conditions or performance goals without ever popping the hood.

Backed by over 20 years of Edge tuning expertise, the Comp Box 2.0 carries forward a legacy of unmatched Cummins performance. Whether you’re after crisp throttle response for your daily commute, added confidence for the street, or maximum horsepower for competition, the Comp Box 2.0 is built to deliver. It’s the trusted performance upgrade that serious 24V Cummins owners rely on to unlock the full potential of their trucks."",""metadescription"":null,""productnotes"":"""",""installationnotes"":"""",""keywords"":"""",""build_to_order"":false,""backorder_message"":null,""additional_backorder_message"":null,""lifecycleStatus"":""active"",""preorder"":false,""clearance_part"":false,""free_shipping_eligible"":true,""ships_free"":false,""direct_only"":0,""releasedate"":""2024-08-08 Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Comp Box 2.0 is the next evolution of diesel performance, engineered as the modern replacement for the legendary Legacy Comp that powered thousands of VP44-equipped trucks for over two decades. Purpose-built for the 1998.5–2002 Dodge Ram 5.9L 24V Cummins, this module is the ultimate solution for drivers who demand maximum performance, power, and complete control. With its proven track record and updated technology, the Comp Box 2.0 delivers huge horsepower and torque gains that make a noticeable difference whether you’re daily driving, hot rodding, or pushing your truck to the limits at the track.

column1: Installation is fast and simple thanks to its true plug-and-play design—no cutting, no splicing, and no complicated setup required. The module works seamlessly with your VP44 fuel system and supports everything from big injectors to larger turbos, making it the ideal choice for both street trucks and full-blown competition builds. With the new Edge smartphone app integration, you gain real-time control over your fuel curves and tuning adjustments directly from your mobile device. This means you can fine-tune your Cummins on the fly, adapting instantly to changing setups and conditions or performance goals without ever popping the hood.

Backed by over 20 years of Edge tuning expertise, the Comp Box 2.0 carries forward a legacy of unmatched Cummins performance. Whether you’re after crisp throttle response for your daily commute, added confidence for the street, or maximum horsepower for competition, the Comp Box 2.0 is built to deliver. It’s the trusted performance upgrade that serious 24V Cummins owners rely on to unlock the full potential of their trucks.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Evolution CTS3 with Locksmith"",""partnumber"":""85400-262"",""upc"":""810065212429"",""shortdescription"":""The Evolution CTS3 for GM Duramax delivers powerful tuning, a sleek touchscreen, and real-time engine monitoring. Boost towing power, throttle response, and efficiency with this premium all-in-one tuner and performance upgrade."",""description"":""The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate performance upgrade for 2017–2023 Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra 6.6L L5P Duramax trucks, combining powerful flash tuning with the industry’s best in-cab monitor. This all-in-one device includes the revolutionary Edge Locksmith tool, which unlocks the ECM and TCM through the OBD-II port, giving you access to preloaded emissions-friendly calibrations designed for daily driving, towing, fuel economy, and performance. Simply flash your truck, unplug the tool, and enjoy safe, reliable power gains you can feel every time you drive.

The CTS3’s 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen provides unmatched visibility and control, letting you track critical parameters, log performance data, and customize gauge layouts. Beyond tuning, the Evolution CTS3 gives you access to an impressive range of adjustable features including tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustment, remembering tow/haul and exhaust brake settings, and more. With its intuitive swipe interface, built-in diagnostics, and Wi-Fi update capability, the CTS3 sets the standard for modern diesel tuning and monitoring.

The Evolution CTS3 also made history as the first to market with 10-speed transmission tuning support, unlocking smoother, stronger shifting on 2020+ L5P trucks. Now, it’s once again leading the way as the first to offer direct OBD-II flash tuning for 2017–2019 6-speed transmissions, eliminating the need for bench flashing or third-party hardware.

Backed by Edge’s 20+ years of diesel tuning expertise, the Evolution CTS3 for L5P Duramax is the go-to choice for owners who want big power gains, better fuel economy, imrpoved drivability while towing and advanced features, and the most powerful monitor in the industry, all in one sleek package.

A PC and our downloadable Update Agent software will be required in order to complete this tune process

**Device can unlock and tune only one vehicle. Once the ECM is unlocked and flashed, the flash can be returned to factory settings, but the Unlock process can not be reversed. vehicle?,7,Emissions,"This part is legal under the provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate performance upgrade for 2017–2023 Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra 6.6L L5P Duramax trucks, combining powerful flash tuning with the industry’s best in-cab monitor. This all-in-one device includes the revolutionary Edge Locksmith tool, which unlocks the ECM and TCM through the OBD-II port, giving you access to preloaded emissions-friendly calibrations designed for daily driving, towing, fuel economy, and performance. Simply flash your truck, unplug the tool, and enjoy safe, reliable power gains you can feel every time you drive.

column1: The CTS3’s 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen provides unmatched visibility and control, letting you track critical parameters, log performance data, and customize gauge layouts. Beyond tuning, the Evolution CTS3 gives you access to an impressive range of adjustable features including tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustment, remembering tow/haul and exhaust brake settings, and more. With its intuitive swipe interface, built-in diagnostics, and Wi-Fi update capability, the CTS3 sets the standard for modern diesel tuning and monitoring.

The Evolution CTS3 also made history as the first to market with 10-speed transmission tuning support, unlocking smoother, stronger shifting on 2020+ L5P trucks. Now, it’s once again leading the way as the first to offer direct OBD-II flash tuning for 2017–2019 6-speed transmissions, eliminating the need for bench flashing or third-party hardware.

Backed by Edge’s 20+ years of diesel tuning expertise, the Evolution CTS3 for L5P Duramax is the go-to choice for owners who want big power gains, better fuel economy, imrpoved drivability while towing and advanced features, and the most powerful monitor in the industry, all in one sleek package.
A PC and our downloadable Update Agent software will be required in order to complete this tune process

**Device can unlock and tune only one vehicle. Once the ECM is unlocked and flashed, the flash can be returned to factory settings, but the Unlock process can not be reversed. If VIN lock and ECM Unlock has been completed, device is non-returnable",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,submodel,

This kit will include the new CTS3 monitor, a new window mount and update cable. This will allow total integration of the state-of-the-art CTS3 monitor for your currently installed Juice with Attitude system. The CTS3 monitor offers faster processing speeds, quicker load times, a more intuitive state-of-the-art swipe technology, crisper display and sleeker look. This kit works for Dodge/Ram Cummins and GM Duramax applications only, and will not support the Ford Power Stroke platforms. For current owners running our backup camera with their CTS2 Juice with Attitude system, our 98107 CTS3 Camera Adapter kit will be required to work with the CTS2 display. *This upgrade kit does NOT include the required Juice modules, sensors, or wiring harnesses associated with it. This part number can not be run as a stand alone monitor and MUST be used in conjunction with a previously installed Juice CS2 or CTS2 vehicle?,7,Emissions,"This part is legal under the provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Make something old, new again with this upgrade kit that will convert a CS2 and CTS2 Juice with Attitude to our latest CTS3 display. This kit will include the new CTS3 monitor, a new window mount and update cable. This will allow total integration of the state-of-the-art CTS3 monitor for your currently installed Juice with Attitude system. The CTS3 monitor offers faster processing speeds, quicker load times, a more intuitive state-of-the-art swipe technology, crisper display and sleeker look.

column1: This kit works for Dodge/Ram Cummins and GM Duramax applications only, and will not support the Ford Power Stroke platforms. For current owners running our backup camera with their CTS2 Juice with Attitude system, our 98107 CTS3 Camera Adapter kit will be required to work with the CTS2 display.

*This upgrade kit does NOT include the required Juice modules, sensors, or wiring harnesses associated with it. This part number can not be run as a stand alone monitor and MUST be used in conjunction with a previously installed Juice CS2 or CTS2 system.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""EZX + Insight CTS3 Kit"",""partnumber"":""33710-3"",""upc"":""810065216823"",""shortdescription"":""2019-2024 Ram 2500/3500 Cummins 2019-2022 Ram Cab & Chassis 3500/4500/5500"",""description"":""The EZX is the ultimate performance upgrade for your 5th Gen Ram Cummins offering total control over your truck with power adjustability on-the-fly. Offering easy installation, improved fuel economy, better towing performance and feature control through the industry's first smartphone app you'll be amazed by what EZX can do for your truck. Compatible with both Standard and High Output engine variants, the throttle response and drivability is exactly what you want and need. This module is completely plug and play and leaves no trace within the system when removed, helping keep your dealer happy. Engineered and developed specifically for the daily driver and towing application, EZX is a safe, emissions friendly upgrade you'll wish you would've made sooner.

With gains as much as 60hp/130ft-lbs torque, the EZX can be adjusted while driving through your factory steering wheel controls, allowing you to fine tune your driving experience at your fingertips. Using the innovative smartphone app available for download through your app store (available for both Android and IOS) you gain even more access to your trucks features including calibrating for tire size and gear ratio changes, throttle pedal sensitivity, max cruise control speed, exhaust brake/tow haul button recall, TPMS settings, engine temperature protection, gear display, fog lights with high beams and even a turbo timer! EZX app also allows you to read and clear trouble codes,  check your emissions readiness status and perform a manual DPF regen cycle.

For the absolute best drivers experience, pair EZX with our Insight CTS3 to stayed informed with everything going on under the hood. Our EZX + Insight CTS3 kits give you everything you need to stay 'in the know', including our vehicle specific A-pillar display mounts for factory fit and finish.

Now supports 2019-2022 Cab & Chassis models. 3500/4500/5500 platforms with
