dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The EZX is the ultimate performance upgrade for your 5th Gen Ram Cummins offering total control over your truck with power adjustability on-the-fly. Offering easy installation, improved fuel economy, better towing performance and feature control through the industry's first smartphone app you'll be amazed by what EZX can do for your truck. Compatible with both Standard and High Output engine variants, the throttle response and drivability is exactly what you want and need. This module is completely plug and play and leaves no trace within the system when removed, helping keep your dealer happy. Engineered and developed specifically for the daily driver and towing application, EZX is a safe, emissions friendly upgrade you'll wish you would've made sooner.

column1: With gains as much as 60hp/130ft-lbs torque, the EZX can be adjusted while driving through your factory steering wheel controls, allowing you to fine tune your driving experience at your fingertips. Using the innovative smartphone app available for download through your app store (available for both Android and IOS) you gain even more access to your trucks features including calibrating for tire size and gear ratio changes, throttle pedal sensitivity, max cruise control speed, exhaust brake/tow haul button recall, TPMS settings, engine temperature protection, gear display, fog lights with high beams and even a turbo timer! EZX app also allows you to read and clear trouble codes,  check your emissions readiness status and perform a manual DPF regen cycle.

For the absolute best drivers experience, pair EZX with our Insight CTS3 to stayed informed with everything going on under the hood. Our EZX + Insight CTS3 kits give you everything you need to stay 'in the know', including our vehicle specific A-pillar display mounts for factory fit and finish.

Now supports 2019-2022 Cab & Chassis models. 3500/4500/5500 platforms with +46hp/120tq",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Comp Box"",""partnumber"":""30305"",""upc"":""810065217240"",""shortdescription"":""1998.5-2000 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 - 5.9L Cummins Diesel"",""description"":""The Edge Comp Box 2.0 is the next evolution of diesel performance, engineered as the modern replacement for the legendary Legacy Comp that powered thousands of VP44-equipped trucks for over two decades. Purpose-built for the 1998.5–2002 Dodge Ram 5.9L 24V Cummins, this module is the ultimate solution for drivers who demand maximum performance, power, and complete control. With its proven track record and updated technology, the Comp Box 2.0 delivers huge horsepower and torque gains that make a noticeable difference whether you’re daily driving, hot rodding, or pushing your truck to the limits at the track.

Installation is fast and simple thanks to its true plug-and-play design—no cutting, no splicing, and no complicated setup required. The module works seamlessly with your VP44 fuel system and supports everything from big injectors to larger turbos, making it the ideal choice for both street trucks and full-blown competition builds. With the new Edge smartphone app integration, you gain real-time control over your fuel curves and tuning adjustments directly from your mobile device. This means you can fine-tune your Cummins on the fly, adapting instantly to changing setups and conditions or performance goals without ever popping the hood.

Backed by over 20 years of Edge tuning expertise, the Comp Box 2.0 carries forward a legacy of unmatched Cummins performance. Whether you’re after crisp throttle response for your daily commute, added confidence for the street, or maximum horsepower for competition, the Comp Box 2.0 is built to deliver. It’s the trusted performance upgrade that serious 24V Cummins owners rely on to unlock the full potential of their of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Comp Box 2.0 is the next evolution of diesel performance, engineered as the modern replacement for the legendary Legacy Comp that powered thousands of VP44-equipped trucks for over two decades. Purpose-built for the 1998.5–2002 Dodge Ram 5.9L 24V Cummins, this module is the ultimate solution for drivers who demand maximum performance, power, and complete control. With its proven track record and updated technology, the Comp Box 2.0 delivers huge horsepower and torque gains that make a noticeable difference whether you’re daily driving, hot rodding, or pushing your truck to the limits at the track.

column1: Installation is fast and simple thanks to its true plug-and-play design—no cutting, no splicing, and no complicated setup required. The module works seamlessly with your VP44 fuel system and supports everything from big injectors to larger turbos, making it the ideal choice for both street trucks and full-blown competition builds. With the new Edge smartphone app integration, you gain real-time control over your fuel curves and tuning adjustments directly from your mobile device. This means you can fine-tune your Cummins on the fly, adapting instantly to changing setups and conditions or performance goals without ever popping the hood.

Backed by over 20 years of Edge tuning expertise, the Comp Box 2.0 carries forward a legacy of unmatched Cummins performance. Whether you’re after crisp throttle response for your daily commute, added confidence for the street, or maximum horsepower for competition, the Comp Box 2.0 is built to deliver. It’s the trusted performance upgrade that serious 24V Cummins owners rely on to unlock the full potential of their trucks.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

column15:
,{""name"":""Evolution CTS3 2019-2022 GM 1500"",""partnumber"":""85452-K"",""upc"":""810065210029"",""shortdescription"":""2019-2022 GM 1500 with 5.3L/6.2L - E90/T93 Unlocking and flashing"",""description"":""The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate performance upgrade for the 2019–2022 Chevy Silverado 1500 with 5.3L and 6.2L gas engines, combining powerful flash tuning with the industry’s most advanced in-cab monitor. Every kit includes the Edge Locksmith tool, which unlocks your factory ECM safely and quickly, giving you access to preloaded, emissions-friendly calibrations built for daily driving, towing, fuel economy, and all-out performance. Just flash your Silverado and enjoy noticeable gains in horsepower and torque that transform how your truck drives.

At the heart of the package is the CTS3’s high-resolution 5-inch touchscreen monitor, providing full control and live data monitoring. You’ll not only gain power but also unlock a range of adjustable features including tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustments, and the ability to remember tow/haul and driving modes. The device can also disable your Active and Dynamic Fuel Management systems, to keep you running on all 8-cylinders all the time. Built-in diagnostics let you read and clear trouble codes, while Wi-Fi support keeps your device updated with the latest features and calibrations.

The Evolution CTS3 also gives Silverado owners an edge over the competition with full transmission tuning support. As the first to market with 10-speed transmission tuning and 8-speed transmissions, the CTS3 delivers smoother shifts, improved drivability, and optimized towing performance without the need for bench flashing.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of tuning expertise, the Evolution CTS3 for GM 5.3L and 6.2L Silverado 1500 is the best all-in-one solution for drivers who want reliable power, efficiency, and control at a value that makes it a smarter choice than the competition.

A PC and our downloadable Update Agent software will be required in order to complete this unlock and tune process

**Device can unlock and tune only one vehicle. Once the ECM is unlocked and flashed, the flash can be returned to factory settings, but the Unlock process can not be reversed. If VIN lock and ECM Unlock has been completed, device is non-returnable

fit my vehicle?,7,Emissions,"This part is legal under the provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate performance upgrade for the 2019–2022 Chevy Silverado 1500 with 5.3L and 6.2L gas engines, combining powerful flash tuning with the industry’s most advanced in-cab monitor. Every kit includes the Edge Locksmith tool, which unlocks your factory ECM safely and quickly, giving you access to preloaded, emissions-friendly calibrations built for daily driving, towing, fuel economy, and all-out performance. Just flash your Silverado and enjoy noticeable gains in horsepower and torque that transform how your truck drives.

column1: At the heart of the package is the CTS3’s high-resolution 5-inch touchscreen monitor, providing full control and live data monitoring. You’ll not only gain power but also unlock a range of adjustable features including tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustments, and the ability to remember tow/haul and driving modes. The device can also disable your Active and Dynamic Fuel Management systems, to keep you running on all 8-cylinders all the time. Built-in diagnostics let you read and clear trouble codes, while Wi-Fi support keeps your device updated with the latest features and calibrations.

The Evolution CTS3 also gives Silverado owners an edge over the competition with full transmission tuning support. As the first to market with 10-speed transmission tuning and 8-speed transmissions, the CTS3 delivers smoother shifts, improved drivability, and optimized towing performance without the need for bench flashing.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of tuning expertise, the Evolution CTS3 for GM 5.3L and 6.2L Silverado 1500 is the best all-in-one solution for drivers who want reliable power, efficiency, and control at a value that makes it a smarter choice than the competition.
A PC and our downloadable Update Agent software will be required in order to complete this unlock and tune process

**Device can unlock and tune only one vehicle. Once the ECM is unlocked and flashed, the flash can be returned to factory settings, but the Unlock process can not be reversed. If VIN lock and ECM Unlock has been completed, device is non-returnable

**Does not support 2022.5+ GM Refresh applications",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,submodel,

Pulsar is a brand new, innovative product that has been engineered to keep your PCM on the truck with no flash tuning, or removal of the computer itself, required. Pulsar is an in-line computer that connects directly to the vehicle PCM, with no additional wiring harness. Do we have your attention yet?!. The all-new, re-engineered Pulsar for Ram Hemi is here and better than ever! As the only inline module on the market today for performance tuning and feature control without requiring modification to the factory PCM, Pulsar is an excellent option for your Ram Hemi owners. The all-new enclosure design replaces our original case for improved durability, reliability and more modern stylish looks. Along with the new case design, we've re-engineered the internal board for increased durability, and performance with the ability to now clear diagnostics trouble codes.



Pulsar For Ram Hemi offers multiple features like speedometer calibration for larger tires or gear ratio changes, disabling your Multi-Displacement System (keep it a V8 all the time!), improved pedal sensitivity, and add as much as 25hp/40ft-lbs of torque with power adjustment on the fly through your cruise control column2: Instructions - D10022800_Rev10.pdf", Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,7,Emissions,"This part is legal under the provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"2019-2024 RAM 6.4L HEMI performance has arrived! Pulsar is a brand new, innovative product that has been engineered to keep your PCM on the truck with no flash tuning, or removal of the computer itself, required. Pulsar is an in-line computer that connects directly to the vehicle PCM, with no additional wiring harness. Do we have your attention yet?!. The all-new, re-engineered Pulsar for Ram Hemi is here and better than ever! As the only inline module on the market today for performance tuning and feature control without requiring modification to the factory PCM, Pulsar is an excellent option for your Ram Hemi owners. The all-new enclosure design replaces our original case for improved durability, reliability and more modern stylish looks. Along with the new case design, we've re-engineered the internal board for increased durability, and performance with the ability to now clear diagnostics trouble codes.

column1: Pulsar For Ram Hemi offers multiple features like speedometer calibration for larger tires or gear ratio changes, disabling your Multi-Displacement System (keep it a V8 all the time!), improved pedal sensitivity, and add as much as 25hp/40ft-lbs of torque with power adjustment on the fly through your cruise control buttons!",About DiabloSport,"Shop the official DiabloSport site to view the Predator, inTune, and Trinity tuners and programmers for late-model GM, Ford, Dodge, Jeep, and Chrysler gas and diesel vehicles. column15:
,{""name"":""Pulsar LT"",""partnumber"":""22454"",""upc"":""810065210852"",""shortdescription"":""Unlock full control of your GM truck with the Pulsar LT! Adjust throttle response, tire size, gear ratio, and disable AFM/DFM, no tuning or tools needed. Plug-and-play power, performance, and precision for your Silverado, Sierra, or SUV."",""description"":""Take command of your GM truck’s performance with the Pulsar LT, the ultimate inline control module designed for late-model GM applications. Engineered for seamless integration, the Pulsar LT installs directly into your vehicle’s computer system, no tuning, no permanent modifications, and no hassle. With this innovative device, you can adjust throttle response, tire size, gear ratio, TPMS settings, and even enable or disable features like Active Fuel Management (AFM) or Dynamic Fuel Management (DFM) in seconds.

Perfect for Silverado, Sierra, Tahoe, Suburban, Colorado, and Yukon owners, the Pulsar LT delivers a new level of customization without voiding your factory warranty. Easily recalibrate your truck for larger tires or gear changes, optimize fuel efficiency, or unleash sharper throttle response for a more engaging driving experience. The on-the-fly adjustability and plug-and-play design make it one of the most versatile upgrades available for GM trucks.

Whether you’re towing, off-roading, or simply cruising, the Pulsar LT ensures your truck performs exactly the way you want it to. Experience smoother shifts, improved drivability, and full control of your vehicle’s key functions all without a complex installation.

*When physically changing ring and pinion gears in the late model GM trucks, the factory cruise control will be disabled. While the Pulsar will allow you to recalibrate the speedometer for that gear change, it will not re-activate the disabled cruise control system or correct any codes that are set. GM has this feature laced into the calibration files and would require full ECM/TCM tuning to re-enable cruise control or to correct any other codes or drivability legal under the provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Take command of your GM truck’s performance with the Pulsar LT, the ultimate inline control module designed for late-model GM applications. Engineered for seamless integration, the Pulsar LT installs directly into your vehicle’s computer system, no tuning, no permanent modifications, and no hassle. With this innovative device, you can adjust throttle response, tire size, gear ratio, TPMS settings, and even enable or disable features like Active Fuel Management (AFM) or Dynamic Fuel Management (DFM) in seconds.

column1: Perfect for Silverado, Sierra, Tahoe, Suburban, Colorado, and Yukon owners, the Pulsar LT delivers a new level of customization without voiding your factory warranty. Easily recalibrate your truck for larger tires or gear changes, optimize fuel efficiency, or unleash sharper throttle response for a more engaging driving experience. The on-the-fly adjustability and plug-and-play design make it one of the most versatile upgrades available for GM trucks.

Whether you’re towing, off-roading, or simply cruising, the Pulsar LT ensures your truck performs exactly the way you want it to. Experience smoother shifts, improved drivability, and full control of your vehicle’s key functions all without a complex installation.

*When physically changing ring and pinion gears in the late model GM trucks, the factory cruise control will be disabled. While the Pulsar will allow you to recalibrate the speedometer for that gear change, it will not re-activate the disabled cruise control system or correct any codes that are set. GM has this feature laced into the calibration files and would require full ECM/TCM tuning to re-enable cruise control or to correct any other codes or drivability concerns",About Range Technology,Increase efficiency and performance with Range Technology AFM/DFM and Start Stop devices. Shop at Holley.com!,SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

,{""name"":""Evolution CTS3 with Locksmith"",""partnumber"":""85400-261"",""upc"":""810065212412"",""shortdescription"":""The Evolution CTS3 for GM Duramax delivers powerful tuning, a sleek touchscreen, and real-time engine monitoring. Boost towing power, throttle response, and efficiency with this premium all-in-one tuner and performance upgrade."",""description"":""The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate performance upgrade for 2017–2023 Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra 6.6L L5P Duramax trucks, combining powerful flash tuning with the industry’s best in-cab monitor. This all-in-one device includes the revolutionary Edge Locksmith tool, which unlocks the ECM and TCM through the OBD-II port, giving you access to preloaded emissions-friendly calibrations designed for daily driving, towing, fuel economy, and performance. Simply flash your truck, unplug the tool, and enjoy safe, reliable power gains you can feel every time you drive.

The CTS3’s 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen provides unmatched visibility and control, letting you track critical parameters, log performance data, and customize gauge layouts. Beyond tuning, the Evolution CTS3 gives you access to an impressive range of adjustable features including tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustment, remembering tow/haul and exhaust brake settings, and more. With its intuitive swipe interface, built-in diagnostics, and Wi-Fi update capability, the CTS3 sets the standard for modern diesel tuning and monitoring.

The Evolution CTS3 also made history as the first to market with 10-speed transmission tuning support, unlocking smoother, stronger shifting on 2020+ L5P trucks. Now, it’s once again leading the way as the first to offer direct OBD-II flash tuning for 2017–2019 6-speed transmissions, eliminating the need for bench flashing or third-party hardware.

Backed by Edge’s 20+ years of diesel tuning expertise, the Evolution CTS3 for L5P Duramax is the go-to choice for owners who want big power gains, better fuel economy, imrpoved drivability while towing and advanced features, and the most powerful monitor in the industry, all in one sleek package.

A PC and our downloadable Update Agent software will be required in order to complete this tune process

**Device can unlock and tune only one vehicle. Once the ECM is unlocked and flashed, the flash can be returned to factory settings, but the Unlock process can not be reversed. dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate performance upgrade for 2017–2023 Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra 6.6L L5P Duramax trucks, combining powerful flash tuning with the industry’s best in-cab monitor. This all-in-one device includes the revolutionary Edge Locksmith tool, which unlocks the ECM and TCM through the OBD-II port, giving you access to preloaded emissions-friendly calibrations designed for daily driving, towing, fuel economy, and performance. Simply flash your truck, unplug the tool, and enjoy safe, reliable power gains you can feel every time you drive.

column1: The CTS3’s 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen provides unmatched visibility and control, letting you track critical parameters, log performance data, and customize gauge layouts. Beyond tuning, the Evolution CTS3 gives you access to an impressive range of adjustable features including tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustment, remembering tow/haul and exhaust brake settings, and more. With its intuitive swipe interface, built-in diagnostics, and Wi-Fi update capability, the CTS3 sets the standard for modern diesel tuning and monitoring.

The Evolution CTS3 also made history as the first to market with 10-speed transmission tuning support, unlocking smoother, stronger shifting on 2020+ L5P trucks. Now, it’s once again leading the way as the first to offer direct OBD-II flash tuning for 2017–2019 6-speed transmissions, eliminating the need for bench flashing or third-party hardware.

Backed by Edge’s 20+ years of diesel tuning expertise, the Evolution CTS3 for L5P Duramax is the go-to choice for owners who want big power gains, better fuel economy, imrpoved drivability while towing and advanced features, and the most powerful monitor in the industry, all in one sleek package.
A PC and our downloadable Update Agent software will be required in order to complete this tune process

**Device can unlock and tune only one vehicle. Once the ECM is unlocked and flashed, the flash can be returned to factory settings, but the Unlock process can not be reversed. If VIN lock and ECM Unlock has been completed, device is non-returnable",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

,{""name"":""Edge Evolution CTS3"",""partnumber"":""85450-150"",""upc"":""810009939887"",""shortdescription"":""1999-2020 Ford Vehicles - Gas"",""description"":""The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the premier flash tuner and digital monitor for Ford gas applications, delivering proven performance and unmatched control for popular models like the F-150, Super Duty, Excursion, Expedition, and more. Whether you’re running a powerful V8 or a turbocharged EcoBoost, the CTS3 is engineered to unlock safe, emissions friendly horsepower and torque gains while improving throttle response, drivability, and efficiency. With its preloaded tuning options for towing, daily driving, fuel economy, and all out performance, the CTS3 gives Ford owners the ability to choose the perfect calibration for any situation.

At the heart of the system is the industry-leading 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen monitor, providing real-time data, performance logging, and full customization of your driving experience. Beyond tuning, the Evolution CTS3 offers powerful adjustable features such as tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustments, and diagnostic capabilities to read and clear DTCs. With its intuitive swipe interface and Wi-Fi updates, keeping your device current and your truck optimized has never been easier.

For Ford gas truck and SUV owners, the Edge Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate all-in-one upgrade combining proven flash tuning, a state-of-the-art monitor, and advanced adjustment features into one sleek device. Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of tuning expertise, it’s the smart choice for drivers who want improved power, towing performance, and everyday drivability in a reliable, emissions-friendly package."",""metadescription"":null,""productnotes"":"""",""installationnotes"":""Ford 3.5L applications are for Ecoboost engines only. November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the premier flash tuner and digital monitor for Ford gas applications, delivering proven performance and unmatched control for popular models like the F-150, Super Duty, Excursion, Expedition, and more. Whether you’re running a powerful V8 or a turbocharged EcoBoost, the CTS3 is engineered to unlock safe, emissions friendly horsepower and torque gains while improving throttle response, drivability, and efficiency. With its preloaded tuning options for towing, daily driving, fuel economy, and all out performance, the CTS3 gives Ford owners the ability to choose the perfect calibration for any situation.

column1: At the heart of the system is the industry-leading 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen monitor, providing real-time data, performance logging, and full customization of your driving experience. Beyond tuning, the Evolution CTS3 offers powerful adjustable features such as tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustments, and diagnostic capabilities to read and clear DTCs. With its intuitive swipe interface and Wi-Fi updates, keeping your device current and your truck optimized has never been easier.

For Ford gas truck and SUV owners, the Edge Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate all-in-one upgrade combining proven flash tuning, a state-of-the-art monitor, and advanced adjustment features into one sleek device. Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of tuning expertise, it’s the smart choice for drivers who want improved power, towing performance, and everyday drivability in a reliable, emissions-friendly package.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

,{""name"":""Edge Evolution 2017-2019 GM Gas CTS3"",""partnumber"":""85452-252"",""upc"":""810009939948"",""shortdescription"":""2017-2019 Chevrolet/GMC/Cadillac/ Gas Vehicles"",""description"":""The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the most advanced flash tuner and digital monitor available for GM gas applications, delivering proven performance and control for Silverado, Sierra, Tahoe, Suburban, and Yukon models equipped with 5.3L, 6.0L, and 6.2L engines. Featuring the industry’s best 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen monitor, the CTS3 combines preloaded, emissions-compliant calibrations with a fully customizable display, giving you noticeable gains in horsepower, torque, and drivability for towing, fuel economy, daily driving, or performance.

The CTS3 goes far beyond basic tuning. It offers powerful adjustable features including tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustments, and the ability to disable GM’s DOD/AFM system, eliminating unwanted cylinder deactivation for smoother performance and reliability. Built-in diagnostics let you read and clear DTCs on the fly. With an intuitive swipe interface and Wi-Fi update support, staying current with the latest features is effortless.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of tuning expertise, the Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate upgrade for GM gas truck and SUV owners who want safe, reliable performance gains, superior monitoring, and full control of their vehicle’s capabilities, all in one sleek device."",""metadescription"":null,""productnotes"":"""",""installationnotes"":""For 2017-2019 full-size trucks, this product is only states, when used in accordance with the manufacturers application guide because it has a California Air Resources Board (CARB) Executive Order (EO) number.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the most advanced flash tuner and digital monitor available for GM gas applications, delivering proven performance and control for Silverado, Sierra, Tahoe, Suburban, and Yukon models equipped with 5.3L, 6.0L, and 6.2L engines. Featuring the industry’s best 5-inch high-resolution touchscreen monitor, the CTS3 combines preloaded, emissions-compliant calibrations with a fully customizable display, giving you noticeable gains in horsepower, torque, and drivability for towing, fuel economy, daily driving, or performance.

column1: The CTS3 goes far beyond basic tuning. It offers powerful adjustable features including tire size recalibration, speed limiter adjustments, and the ability to disable GM’s DOD/AFM system, eliminating unwanted cylinder deactivation for smoother performance and reliability. Built-in diagnostics let you read and clear DTCs on the fly. With an intuitive swipe interface and Wi-Fi update support, staying current with the latest features is effortless.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of tuning expertise, the Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate upgrade for GM gas truck and SUV owners who want safe, reliable performance gains, superior monitoring, and full control of their vehicle’s capabilities, all in one sleek device.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

column1: Universal Bluetooth connectivity. Packtalk Edge connects with any other Bluetooth intercom system of any brand.
Waterproof. No matter what you throw at it, your waterproof Packtalk Edge will take the beating and keep you connected.
Universal installation. Easy to install in most motorcycle helmets, of any brand.

*Product shown installed on a Simpson Mod Bandit for reference, Simpson Packtalk Edge does NOT include a helmet.",About Simpson Motorcycle,"From sleek and stylish helmets to protective riding apparel, Simpson Motorcycle has everything you need to stay safe and stylish on the road.",SPECS,,,,,,,,,,,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Edge Diesel Evolution CS2 - 50 State"",""partnumber"":""85300"",""upc"":""810115011736"",""shortdescription"":""1994-2019 Chevrolet/GMC/Ford/Dodge/RAM Diesel Trucks - 50 State Legal"",""description"":""The Edge Evolution CS2 is the budget-friendly way to add reliable flash tuning and digital monitoring to your diesel truck, combining performance, efficiency, and value in one compact package. Designed for Ford Power Stroke, Dodge Cummins, and GM Duramax applications, the CS2 delivers proven, 50-state emissions-compliant calibrations that improve horsepower, torque, throttle response, and fuel economy for daily driving, towing, or performance use. With multiple preloaded tuning levels, you can select the calibration that best suits your needs and reflash your ECM in minutes.

Compact and easy to use, the CS2’s color screen monitor lets you view critical engine parameters in real time, customize gauge layouts, and quickly read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs) without a trip to the shop. Its plug-and-play design makes installation simple, while its sleek dash-mounted display provides a clean, factory-style look. Whether you’re towing a heavy load, looking to maximize mileage, or simply want more responsive power for everyday driving, the Evolution CS2 gives you the tools to get the job done.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Evolution CS2 is the perfect choice for drivers who want safe, affordable tuning and monitoring in one device, delivering real-world gains and reliability you can count column2: Instructions - techlibrary_d-541-18.pdf", Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,1,Emissions,"This part is legal for sale and use on Emissions Controlled Vehicles, in all 50 states, when used in accordance with the manufacturers application guide because it has a California Air Resources Board (CARB) Executive Order (EO) number.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Evolution CS2 is the budget-friendly way to add reliable flash tuning and digital monitoring to your diesel truck, combining performance, efficiency, and value in one compact package. Designed for Ford Power Stroke, Dodge Cummins, and GM Duramax applications, the CS2 delivers proven, 50-state emissions-compliant calibrations that improve horsepower, torque, throttle response, and fuel economy for daily driving, towing, or performance use. With multiple preloaded tuning levels, you can select the calibration that best suits your needs and reflash your ECM in minutes.

column1: Compact and easy to use, the CS2’s color screen monitor lets you view critical engine parameters in real time, customize gauge layouts, and quickly read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs) without a trip to the shop. Its plug-and-play design makes installation simple, while its sleek dash-mounted display provides a clean, factory-style look. Whether you’re towing a heavy load, looking to maximize mileage, or simply want more responsive power for everyday driving, the Evolution CS2 gives you the tools to get the job done.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Evolution CS2 is the perfect choice for drivers who want safe, affordable tuning and monitoring in one device, delivering real-world gains and reliability you can count on.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",VEHICLE SPECIFIC ATTRIBUTES,SPECS,EMISSIONS,1,TECH RESOURCES,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

column15:
,{""name"":""Edge Juice w/ Attitude CTS3"",""partnumber"":""31500-3"",""upc"":""810065210159"",""shortdescription"":""1998.5-2000 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 - 5.9L Cummins Diesel"",""description"":""The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

column1: What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and control.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""DiabloSport PULSAR"",""partnumber"":""32453"",""upc"":""810115018995"",""shortdescription"":""Fits 2019-2022 Ram 1500 5.7L Hemi"",""description"":""2019-2022 RAM 5.7 HEMI performance has arrived! Pulsar is a brand new, innovative product that has been engineered to keep your PCM on the truck with no flash tuning, or removal of the computer itself, required. Pulsar is an in-line computer that connects directly to the vehicle PCM, with no additional wiring harness. Do we have your attention yet?!. The all-new, re-engineered Pulsar for Ram Hemi is here and better than ever! As the only inline module on the market today for performance tuning and feature control without requiring modification to the factory PCM, Pulsar is an excellent option for your Ram Hemi owners. The all-new enclosure design replaces our original case for improved durability, reliability and more modern stylish looks. Along with the new case design, we've re-engineered the internal board for increased durability, and performance with the ability to now clear diagnostics trouble codes.



Pulsar For Ram Hemi offers multiple features like speedometer calibration for larger tires or gear ratio changes, disabling your Multi-Displacement System (keep it a V8 all the time!), improved pedal sensitivity, and add as much as 30hp/30ft-lbs of torque with power adjustment on the fly through your cruise control buttons!



*2022 Ram Owners - Because of supply chain issues at Chrysler, some 2022 model trucks were built and shipped with a different GPEC5 PCM, which will not work with the Pulsar 32453. If you own a 2022 model, please verify your ECM has the two harness connectors located on the side of the ECM, not along the top narrow edge. Your vehicle will need the GPEC2A ECM in order for Pulsar to The performance mode is by far the best reason to purchase this mod! Unbelievable pedal response and your Hemi actually performs like a V8! Economy mode doesn’t add much. 19 combined and 22 highway with 20” tires. I do prefer Econ mode over stock however. I did not experience any issues with check engine lights, etc and am overall pretty happy with purchase. Install is a bit tight, but manageable. Wouldn’t want to uninstall too many times to return to dealer for factory service."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-06-14 12:31:58"",""updateddate"":""June 14, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":2136,""customerid"":7362,""firstname"":""RONALD"",""lastname"":""LUKS"",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""June 19, 2021"",""title"":""Works as promised"",""reviewtext"":""I bought this about a month ago and installed it on my 2020 Ram 1500, 5.7 hemi. I bought it primarily for towing my enclosed 26 foot car hauler, with a 64 Plymouth Savoy Super Stock car, total weight about 9000 lbs.
I was getting 6 MPG  at anywhere from 65 to 70 MPH without it, I have the 3.92 rear gear. After towing with it for a 300 mile round trip I recieved 9 MPG at 70 MPH, 10 MPG at 55 MPH. Great increase and I'm not dialed in yet on the sweet spot of MPH, need to test between 65 and 70 MPH in one mile per hour increments.  Over all I'm really pleased and would recommend it for the Ram 1500, hemis. I tried the performance mode with out a trailer and could break loose the rear tires. The economy mode added about 6 miles per gallon under 55 MPH. and it was amazing. Then I started getting check engine lights and codes. It wasn’t really a huge thing until my truck went into limp mode and I had to go from a red light into a lot at 5 mph. Couldn’t clear codes with my reader and had to pull the negative to clear everything. BUT it woke my truck up so much that I just couldn’t stop thinking about it, like a girl that cheats but it was just so good you almost don’t care. 

So, I got this new one in an attempt to mend our relationship. It woke my truck up just like last time but this one’s got heels. The old version would fight and deactivate the cylinder deactivation every time it came on in the old version. This one limits the gear to 8 so it doesn’t ever kick on. I’m super happy with this one just praying she doesn’t cheat and throw codes. 4 stars only because I’m scared. So at this point I sent my first email in to ask what was up. Return email basically said put it into a mds/off mode and it will disable it. Ordered an update cable and updated unit. Still kept going into mds mode. After taking pictures and sending another email to ask what’s up and what needs to be done I am a month now without so much as a reply. Fuel economy up 3 points from 14.1 to 17.3mpg already. Performance? Haven't romped it yet. Stay tuned.."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2022-07-21 16:09:43"",""updateddate"":""July 21, 2022"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3312,""customerid"":416048,""firstname"":""DonRob87"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""March 26, 2022"",""title"":""Turned my 2020 Ram 1500 into a BEAST"",""reviewtext"":""This was a perfect addition to my Ram. Accompanied with my installed K&N High Flow Cold Air Intake and Outlaw Direct Flow Muffler, this tuner made for a perfect trio to unleash my Ram’s full potential. Installation was very easy and straightforward (took me less than an hour) thanks to clear and simple instructions. The 8 levels are intuitive and I love how I can easily control and switch between them using the cruise control keys and see it right on the dashboard panel.

I typically keep it in Economy MDS Off (this level maximizes my fuel economy which is the reason I bought this in the first place; I’ve gained an average of 2.5 mpg; now I average around 20mpg city with all 3 performance mods) but several times I threw it in Performance MDS Off which REALLY hauls A! Throttle response is flawless and the horsepower and torque boost adds a fluid punch. Even in the tow levels, you can feel the increased torque. As far as the MDS Off levels, it perfectly turns off MDS which makes a huge difference in performance as turning off the 4 cylinders is counterintuitive to performance if you have increased airflow such as with a Cold Air Intake and/or Direct Flow Muffler installed. And as an added benefit, NO MORE DRONING!!

This tuner is well worth the investment and a great addition for fine tuning and maximum performance on your Ram especially if you already have performance parts installed."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2022-03-26 17:02:48"",""updateddate"":""March 26, 2022"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3313,""customerid"":416049,""firstname"":""DW Rabbit"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""November 15, 2020"",""title"":""Great purchase!"",""reviewtext"":""I have had this product for about a month and it works as advertised, love that the controls are built into the steering wheel and can change on the fly."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-11-15 14:08:28"",""updateddate"":""November 15, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3314,""customerid"":416050,""firstname"":""Bin besher"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""December 11, 2020"",""title"":""Excellent"",""reviewtext"":""Really is excellent and I get the power full power"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-12-11 04:42:55"",""updateddate"":""December 11, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3315,""customerid"":416051,""firstname"":""enads"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""June 19, 2019"",""title"":""Never going back to stock!"",""reviewtext"":""Immediate pedal response and horsepower increase. Great features"",""reviewtext"":""I bought this a few weeks ago and, after reading reviews about the problems experienced in 2019, I reached out to The Diablosport team to verify compatibility with my 2021 Ram Laramie.  I was assured that it was compatible.  
Installation is simple and straight forward.   The results are amazing. Crisp throttle response in both tow and performance modes.   Turning of MDS is just the icing on the cake. After use of Diablo handheld tubers on my last three GM pickups, the company has earned my trust. Super easy install. I did buy the USB-OBDII cable so I could update the Pulsar software if need be. It did come already updated but I'm glad I can update as new software releases become available. I did have issues after the install with the 12"" navigation system....I lost alot of the settings apps and control of the heat/cool system which is controlled from the nav system. It was like the nav system reverted to the software for the 8"" display. Everything just looked different is how I'd explain it. After a few hours, the system updated itself and everything is back to normal. The inline tuner is awesome that you can make changes on the fly and it's integrated with the instrument cluster display. I really wish they would add the ability to defeat the speed limiter and Auto-off feature. Maybe that will be available down the line. I'm really happy with the instant throttle response...oh my!!! And I'm getting 3 miles per gallon better fuel economy with the ""Performance"" setting. Went from 16.5 to 19.5. A worthy purchase indeed."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-03-19 20:28:48"",""updateddate"":""March 19, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3343,""customerid"":416077,""firstname"":""Lonewolf1204"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""4"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""March 14, 2019"",""title"":""Power"",""reviewtext"":""Notice right after installing pulsar a  great deal of power when I accelerated . The first one had an issue, but customer service immediately despatched another. Fitting is not the easiest, and takes a little patience as the bolts become 'hidden' by other engine components. My PCM cables were just about long enough but it was a squeeze. The difference in engine response is immediate (Performance mode on), and it brings a smile to my face. Its not TRX or Raptor performance, but it beats most other trucks off the line."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2022-04-26 15:37:37"",""updateddate"":""April 26, 2022"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3367,""customerid"":416101,""firstname"":""RonK"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""January 2, 2019"",""title"":""Great Product"",""reviewtext"":""This is a great product. Just wasn’t for me the only thing i really felt was throttle response was improved but as far as MPG I didn’t see a difference"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-03-15 20:07:07"",""updateddate"":""March 15, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3369,""customerid"":416103,""firstname"":""Rugman"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""March 6, 2020"",""title"":""Easy install"",""reviewtext"":""Love the performance and throttle response I now have when in performance MDS mode, I haven’t use any other mode as of yet. This next week I’ll install cold air intake. My 2019 Ram 1500 5.7 already has Borla cat back exhaust. Now with the Pulsar really sounds great!
I’m very please with this purchase."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-03-06 12:54:33"",""updateddate"":""March 6, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3370,""customerid"":416104,""firstname"":""RyanTRamus"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""July 15, 2020"",""title"":""4+ MPG Street, 3+ MPG towing, More Power"",""reviewtext"":""I've been driving this for about a month now. I find I do the opposite of what some people suggested doing, and get the most efficiency out of my 2019 Ram Classic. In town, I use eco mode. The throttle response is slower and smoother. On the freeway, I use performance mode, as it responds better at higher speeds and shifts immediately. My first tank of gas took me from 15 mpg average, to 19 mpg average. Towing a decent load, I was averaging 11-12 mpg. Towing that same load with the Pulsar, I got 15+. It rarely shifted lower than 6th gear, and only went down to 5th on the steepest hills. Before, I was shifting down to 4th and killing cruise control just so I didn't rev so high. I put the manual gear selector in either 6 or 7 and pulled 70-75 mph with no problems. 

My advice is get it. Be careful of performance mode in town, because you can't push the gas soft enough not to screech the tires."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-07-15 12:20:41"",""updateddate"":""July 15, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3371,""customerid"":416105,""firstname"":""Seaducks"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""4"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""May 24, 2020"",""title"":""Throttle Response"",""reviewtext"":""Super easy install and very easy to change between levels. 

My 2019 Ram Classic has also been upgraded with vararam air grabber and cat back exhaust, so I can’t say what the programmer has done alone. I will say it has great throttle response now and more “seat of the pants” power. 

I’m running 93 octane as well, so there are a lot of variables to throw in the equation. 

I can’t give it an excellent rating because I cannot say that it is the reason for all the gains. That is not Diablo’s fault."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-05-24 13:56:48"",""updateddate"":""May 24, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3372,""customerid"":416106,""firstname"":""Sd1771"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""3"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""January 3, 2022"",""title"":""Ez to install"",""reviewtext"":""I installed this a couple of weeks ago and so far the biggest noticeable difference I see is the throttle response… at first the electrical I thought were messed up as my radio did not work but then the next day everything was fine as I think it takes sometime for system to adapt…
Other than that I’m looking for increases in mpg but it’s not giving me the 2-3 mph I was hoping for.."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2022-01-03 21:05:37"",""updateddate"":""January 3, 2022"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3373,""customerid"":416107,""firstname"":""SN391"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""May 13, 2019"",""title"":""Added Performance"",""reviewtext"":""I like the added performance and easily selected with the touch of a button"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-05-13 00:53:13"",""updateddate"":""May 13, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32453"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3374,""customerid"":416108,""firstname"":""staley"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""3"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""April 23, 2022"",""title"":""Does work somewhat but not worth it"",""reviewtext"":""I've had installed and drove 100 miles.  I did see approx 1 mpg better hwy on performance mode and it did seem to have more throttle/shift response but the backup/front sensors are disabled now.  I don't have confidence in the unit so I'll be returning. column2: Instructions - 75daa6ee71c914bf88bd6acc8e451f6ddb8c1dec.pdf", Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,7,Emissions,"This part is legal under the provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"2019-2022 RAM 5.7 HEMI performance has arrived! Pulsar is a brand new, innovative product that has been engineered to keep your PCM on the truck with no flash tuning, or removal of the computer itself, required. Pulsar is an in-line computer that connects directly to the vehicle PCM, with no additional wiring harness. Do we have your attention yet?!. The all-new, re-engineered Pulsar for Ram Hemi is here and better than ever! As the only inline module on the market today for performance tuning and feature control without requiring modification to the factory PCM, Pulsar is an excellent option for your Ram Hemi owners. The all-new enclosure design replaces our original case for improved durability, reliability and more modern stylish looks. Along with the new case design, we've re-engineered the internal board for increased durability, and performance with the ability to now clear diagnostics trouble codes.

column1: Pulsar For Ram Hemi offers multiple features like speedometer calibration for larger tires or gear ratio changes, disabling your Multi-Displacement System (keep it a V8 all the time!), improved pedal sensitivity, and add as much as 30hp/30ft-lbs of torque with power adjustment on the fly through your cruise control buttons!

*2022 Ram Owners - Because of supply chain issues at Chrysler, some 2022 model trucks were built and shipped with a different GPEC5 PCM, which will not work with the Pulsar 32453. If you own a 2022 model, please verify your ECM has the two harness connectors located on the side of the ECM, not along the top narrow edge. Your vehicle will need the GPEC2A ECM in order for Pulsar to work.",About DiabloSport,"Shop the official DiabloSport site to view the Predator, inTune, and Trinity tuners and programmers for late-model GM, Ford, Dodge, Jeep, and Chrysler gas and diesel vehicles. ",VEHICLE SPECIFIC ATTRIBUTES,SPECS,EMISSIONS,7,TECH RESOURCES,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""DiabloSport Pulsar XT"",""partnumber"":""32456"",""upc"":""810065218353"",""shortdescription"":""Fits 2019-2024 Ram 1500 5.7L Hemi, 2019-2024 Ram 1500 3.6L V6"",""description"":""Pulsar XT is an all-new take on drivability and calibration for your 3.6L and 5.7L Ram 1500. Unlike any other device on the market, Pulsar XT is an innovative inline module engineered to keep your factory PCM untouched, with no PCM swap or unlock required. This is the most advanced and easiest way to disable your V8's MDS system to eliminate 4-cylinder mode and keep that Hemi running on all 8, all the time. The built in throttle pedal sensitivity control also helps you fine tune your pedal feel to eliminate throttle lag and make your Hemi drive like you want it too. Why spend $1000's on different devices and hope they'll work together when Pulsar XT does it all in one simple 15-minute install with state-of-the-art smartphone app control.



Enjoy Pulsar XT's shift-on-the-fly pedal programming, with 7 levels changeable through your steering wheel controls. The smartphone app allows you to adjust your speedometer for larger tires, transfer case ratio changes and gear ratio changes. Along with adjusting TPMS settings, disabling your Auto Start/Stop, and checking and clearing DTC's. You'll love the way your Ram Hemi reacts with Pulsar XT, with improved throttle response, tire size calibration, and improved drivability running in V8 all the time. You'll wish you would've installed Pulsar XT sooner!



*Fits new body style E-Trq and Non E-Trq models (No Classic models)

29, 2024"",""title"":""Works as advertised, but...."",""reviewtext"":""Bought this for my 2024 Ram 1500 etorque and it does work as advertised, but there's a bug or firmware issue that is causeing a check engine light. Engin codes that get thrown are the p2122 and p2127. Both are for the gas peddle. I have talked with Holley support about it and they did send me a new unit. Unfortunately the new unit has the exact same problem. The Pulsar XT does do exactly what it is suppose to do, but you will have permanent check engine light on your dash that will not go away. Be aware that a check engine light will disable your remote start feature on your truck. I will keep working with Holley support to either figure this issue out and eventually git rid of the check engine light or i'll just return it and check back later in the year when the issue has a fixed or they create a new product."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2024-04-29 01:13:41"",""updateddate"":""April 29, 2024"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January Details,OVERVIEW,"Pulsar XT is an all-new take on drivability and calibration for your 3.6L and 5.7L Ram 1500. Unlike any other device on the market, Pulsar XT is an innovative inline module engineered to keep your factory PCM untouched, with no PCM swap or unlock required. This is the most advanced and easiest way to disable your V8's MDS system to eliminate 4-cylinder mode and keep that Hemi running on all 8, all the time. The built in throttle pedal sensitivity control also helps you fine tune your pedal feel to eliminate throttle lag and make your Hemi drive like you want it too. Why spend $1000's on different devices and hope they'll work together when Pulsar XT does it all in one simple 15-minute install with state-of-the-art smartphone app control.

column1: Enjoy Pulsar XT's shift-on-the-fly pedal programming, with 7 levels changeable through your steering wheel controls. The smartphone app allows you to adjust your speedometer for larger tires, transfer case ratio changes and gear ratio changes. Along with adjusting TPMS settings, disabling your Auto Start/Stop, and checking and clearing DTC's. You'll love the way your Ram Hemi reacts with Pulsar XT, with improved throttle response, tire size calibration, and improved drivability running in V8 all the time. You'll wish you would've installed Pulsar XT sooner!
*Fits new body style E-Trq and Non E-Trq models (No Classic models)

**Trucks equipped with paddle shifters not currently supported",About DiabloSport,"Shop the official DiabloSport site to view the Predator, inTune, and Trinity tuners and programmers for late-model GM, Ford, Dodge, Jeep, and Chrysler gas and diesel vehicles. ,{""name"":""Pulsar V3 w/ Edge Insight CTS3"",""partnumber"":""22601-3"",""upc"":""810065210791"",""shortdescription"":""2020-2023 Chevrolet Silverado/GMC Sierra 2500/3500"",""description"":""The Edge Pulsar V3 for 2017–2023 GM 6.6L L5P Duramax is the ultimate inline performance module, delivering massive emissions friendly power gains with zero hassle. Featuring a true plug-and-play design, the Pulsar V3 installs in minutes with no cutting, splicing, or wiring required, and it’s just as easy to remove, leaving no trace for warranty work.

Take complete control of your Duramax with on-the-fly power level adjustments directly from your factory steering wheel controls, no need for extra switches or bulky controllers. The Pulsar V3 also features a built-in throttle sensitivity booster for instant throttle response and a more aggressive driving experience, whether you’re towing heavy loads, daily driving, or pushing your truck on the open road.

Designed with state-of-the-art standalone ECU-style technology, the Pulsar V3 gives you advanced control and safety. With integrated safety backdowns, your engine is always protected while still enjoying maximum performance. You can also calibrate for larger tires and make TPMS adjustments with ease.

For drivers who demand more from their trucks, the Edge Pulsar V3 is the proven performance solution—combining unmatched power, reliability, and control for the modern Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra diesel trucks.

Pair it with an Edge Insight CTS3 monitor for even more features and control.

*When physically changing ring and pinion gears in the late model GM trucks, the factory cruise control will be disabled. While the Pulsar will allow you to recalibrate the speedometer for that gear change, it will not re-activate the disabled cruise control system. GM has this feature laced into the engine calibration files and would require full ECM tuning to enable cruise November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Pulsar V3 for 2017–2023 GM 6.6L L5P Duramax is the ultimate inline performance module, delivering massive emissions friendly power gains with zero hassle. Featuring a true plug-and-play design, the Pulsar V3 installs in minutes with no cutting, splicing, or wiring required, and it’s just as easy to remove, leaving no trace for warranty work.

column1: Take complete control of your Duramax with on-the-fly power level adjustments directly from your factory steering wheel controls, no need for extra switches or bulky controllers. The Pulsar V3 also features a built-in throttle sensitivity booster for instant throttle response and a more aggressive driving experience, whether you’re towing heavy loads, daily driving, or pushing your truck on the open road.

Designed with state-of-the-art standalone ECU-style technology, the Pulsar V3 gives you advanced control and safety. With integrated safety backdowns, your engine is always protected while still enjoying maximum performance. You can also calibrate for larger tires and make TPMS adjustments with ease.

For drivers who demand more from their trucks, the Edge Pulsar V3 is the proven performance solution—combining unmatched power, reliability, and control for the modern Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra diesel trucks.
Pair it with an Edge Insight CTS3 monitor for even more features and control.

*When physically changing ring and pinion gears in the late model GM trucks, the factory cruise control will be disabled. While the Pulsar will allow you to recalibrate the speedometer for that gear change, it will not re-activate the disabled cruise control system. GM has this feature laced into the engine calibration files and would require full ECM tuning to enable cruise again.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

This kit includes an EGT probe and two 0-100psi pressure sensors, allowing you to accurately monitor exhaust gas temperatures, boost pressure, and fuel pressure all through the sleek CTS3 display. Whether you’re towing heavy loads, daily driving, or pushing your truck harder, the Street Diesel Kit delivers the critical data you need in real time.

With its easy plug-and-play integration, installation is quick and hassle-free, eliminating the need for multiple standalone gauges cluttering up your cab. Instead, you get a clean, factory-style setup that feeds all the information directly into your CTS3 digital monitor. This allows for customizable gauge layouts, performance alerts, and data logging, so you can fine-tune your driving and keep your truck operating safely and efficiently.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel performance innovation, the EAS Street Diesel Kit is the perfect solution for drivers who demand reliability, convenience, and precision monitoring. Racing"",""Superchips""],""hasFilterGrid"":true,""hasNav"":true,""products"":[]},""brand"":""Edge"",""url"":""/products/off-road/parts/98623""}",, Larger Image,,,,,,OVERVIEW,"The Edge EAS Street Diesel Kit is the ultimate plug-in accessory upgrade for your CTS3 monitor, giving you the tools to track and protect your diesel like never before. This kit includes an EGT probe and two 0-100psi pressure sensors, allowing you to accurately monitor exhaust gas temperatures, boost pressure, and fuel pressure all through the sleek CTS3 display. Whether you’re towing heavy loads, daily driving, or pushing your truck harder, the Street Diesel Kit delivers the critical data you need in real time.

column1: With its easy plug-and-play integration, installation is quick and hassle-free, eliminating the need for multiple standalone gauges cluttering up your cab. Instead, you get a clean, factory-style setup that feeds all the information directly into your CTS3 digital monitor. This allows for customizable gauge layouts, performance alerts, and data logging, so you can fine-tune your driving and keep your truck operating safely and efficiently.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel performance innovation, the EAS Street Diesel Kit is the perfect solution for drivers who demand reliability, convenience, and precision monitoring. Pair it with your CTS3 tuner or monitor to create the ultimate all-in-one performance and safety system for your diesel truck.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,TECH RESOURCES,,,,,,,,,,REVIEWS

column8: Insight+ Monitor and Custom Tuning Device

Insight+ is a premium display offering real-time monitoring and the ability to read and write custom tuning. It delivers exceptional control, performance, and diagnostic precision for drivers seeking custom calibration and advanced data.

column15:
,{""name"":""Insight+ Monitor and Custom Tuning Device"",""partnumber"":""84140"",""upc"":""850058611648"",""shortdescription"":""Insight+ is a premium display offering real-time monitoring and the ability to read and write custom tuning. It delivers exceptional control, performance, and diagnostic precision for drivers seeking custom calibration and advanced data."",""description"":""Take full control of your diesel performance with the Edge Insight+, the latest evolution of the industry-leading CTS3 monitor. Unlike the standard Insight CTS3, the Insight+ comes preloaded with a VIN-specific license, giving you the power to not only monitor your engine but also flash custom tuning calibrations directly into your truck, all from one device.

Engineered and currently supporting 1994–2019 Ford Power Stroke and 2004.5-2016 GM Duramax with 2001-2004 GM LB7 Duramax and 2003-2012 Ram Cummins under development, the Insight+ offers seamless integration and an intuitive, high-resolution 5” touchscreen display. With just a few swipes, you can track critical engine parameters in real time, adjust settings, and fine-tune your truck’s performance to match your exact driving style, towing demands, or performance goals.

The Insight+ custom tuning capabilities mean you can load and manage tunes from your preferred custom tuner without additional hardware, keeping your setup clean and efficient. Beyond tuning, the CTS3 platform offers a wealth of diagnostic tools, data logging, performance testing, and gauge customization, making it the most versatile monitoring and tuning solution on the market.

Backed by over 20 years of Edge Products’ diesel tuning innovation, the Edge Insight+ is the perfect upgrade for serious truck owners who want to maximize power, torque, throttle response, and drivability—all in a single, easy to use device.

*Device does not include tuning. Custom Tuning calibrations must be purchased seperatley from your preferred Custom Calibration EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Take full control of your diesel performance with the Edge Insight+, the latest evolution of the industry-leading CTS3 monitor. Unlike the standard Insight CTS3, the Insight+ comes preloaded with a VIN-specific license, giving you the power to not only monitor your engine but also flash custom tuning calibrations directly into your truck, all from one device.

column1: Engineered and currently supporting 1994–2019 Ford Power Stroke and 2004.5-2016 GM Duramax with 2001-2004 GM LB7 Duramax and 2003-2012 Ram Cummins under development, the Insight+ offers seamless integration and an intuitive, high-resolution 5” touchscreen display. With just a few swipes, you can track critical engine parameters in real time, adjust settings, and fine-tune your truck’s performance to match your exact driving style, towing demands, or performance goals.

The Insight+ custom tuning capabilities mean you can load and manage tunes from your preferred custom tuner without additional hardware, keeping your setup clean and efficient. Beyond tuning, the CTS3 platform offers a wealth of diagnostic tools, data logging, performance testing, and gauge customization, making it the most versatile monitoring and tuning solution on the market.

Backed by over 20 years of Edge Products’ diesel tuning innovation, the Edge Insight+ is the perfect upgrade for serious truck owners who want to maximize power, torque, throttle response, and drivability—all in a single, easy to use device.

*Device does not include tuning. Custom Tuning calibrations must be purchased seperatley from your preferred Custom Calibration Shop",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Edge Juice w/ Attitude CTS3"",""partnumber"":""21501-3"",""upc"":""810065210128"",""shortdescription"":""2004.5-2005 LLY Duramax"",""description"":""The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance tuner and monitor combo for 2001–2007 GM 6.6L Duramax LB7, LLY, and LBZ trucks, delivering big power, unmatched safety, and total control in one package. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude transforms your Silverado or Sierra into a towing, hauling, or performance machine with just the touch of a button.

Featuring true on-the-fly tuning adjustments through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 color touchscreen monitor, this system allows you to instantly switch between multiple power levels to match your driving needs. Built-in safety backdowns automatically safeguard your engine and transmission by monitoring critical parameters, ensuring reliable performance even under extreme conditions. The CTS3 monitor gives you full visibility into your Duramax with customizable digital gauges, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs) on the spot.

Whether you’re towing a heavy load, daily driving, or building a street/strip Duramax, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 delivers responsive throttle control, improved drivability, and reliable, emissions-friendly power.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning expertise, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 for LB7, LLY, and LBZ Duramax trucks is the proven performance solution, combining power, safety, and (8)bodytransmission, Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,7,Emissions,"This part is legal under the provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance tuner and monitor combo for 2001–2007 GM 6.6L Duramax LB7, LLY, and LBZ trucks, delivering big power, unmatched safety, and total control in one package. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude transforms your Silverado or Sierra into a towing, hauling, or performance machine with just the touch of a button.

column1: Featuring true on-the-fly tuning adjustments through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 color touchscreen monitor, this system allows you to instantly switch between multiple power levels to match your driving needs. Built-in safety backdowns automatically safeguard your engine and transmission by monitoring critical parameters, ensuring reliable performance even under extreme conditions. The CTS3 monitor gives you full visibility into your Duramax with customizable digital gauges, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs) on the spot.

Whether you’re towing a heavy load, daily driving, or building a street/strip Duramax, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 delivers responsive throttle control, improved drivability, and reliable, emissions-friendly power.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning expertise, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 for LB7, LLY, and LBZ Duramax trucks is the proven performance solution, combining power, safety, and control with the industry’s most advanced monitor.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS
