23, 2018"",""title"":""Great Product ... works on 86-90 YJ's too ... Good bye Carter Carb"",""reviewtext"":""I recently purchased an 88 YJ with the AMC 258.  The Carter/BBD Carb caused all sorts of issues, most importantly, stalling every time the Jeep came to a stop.  I knew I could rebuild the carb and restore better performance, but from what I understand the BBD never performed well, even when new.  I'd been looking for an EFI solution and was thrilled when Holley introduced their Sniper EFI for the Jeep CJ.  I believe I was their first customer for this great new product.  I checked with them and confirmed it would also work on my 88 YJ.  The install took a long weekend.  It probably would have gone faster, but I was working with my son (it will be his Jeep), so we took our time.  

The toughest thing was deconstructing the old vacuum system and figuring out what could be removed (most everything) and what remained (PCV, distributor advance, EGR Valve and cannister, and the line that goes controls the vacuum shift fork).  I'd recommend getting some 3/8 and 3/16 vacuum hose as well.  You'll need it to make the final connection to the Sniper.  The leftovers from the original don't enable you to have a clean setup.

I also got the Holley fuel pump kit with 40' of hose.  It was just what we needed.  The only issue I had with it was that the fuel inlet to the Sniper is too close to the valve cover to use the straight fuel line connector that comes with the kit.  I purchased two 90 degree connectors and that cleaned up the inlet and outlet routing considerably.

I made two minor mistakes during install that slowed us down.  I picked a bad source of switched 12V, so the controller didn't activate initially.  I started with the wire for the old vacuum switch that controlled the pulsed exhaust system - it dropped to 4V during start.  I rewired using the switched 12V on the solenoid for the carb.  That worked great.  I also miswired the fuel pump ... didn't see the + and -.  

Once those mistakes were fixed, it started right up.  We've got about 30 miles on it and its running great.  I haven't set up with a new distributor for ignition timing yet, but plan to do that in the future.  I'm getting some engine knock, but hopefully will be able to address once I better understand the tuning and get the timing control added.

Thanks for a great product!!!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2018-09-23 14:41:01"",""updateddate"":""September 23, 2018"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""550-858"",""feedback"":[{""customer_id"":45234,""feedback_type"":""helpful""},{""customer_id"":65121,""feedback_type"":""helpful""},{""customer_id"":67009,""feedback_type"":""helpful""},{""customer_id"":84740,""feedback_type"":""helpful""},{""customer_id"":117619,""feedback_type"":""helpful""},{""customer_id"":188344,""feedback_type"":""helpful""},{""customer_id"":207700,""feedback_type"":""helpful""},{""customer_id"":275289,""feedback_type"":""helpful""}],""images"":[]},{""id"":869,""customerid"":216905,""firstname"":""wes"",""lastname"":""collins"",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":1,""entrydate"":""February 24, 2021"",""title"":""Sniper runs great"",""reviewtext"":""Looking forward to driving more. ,{""name"":""Edge Juice w/ Attitude CTS3"",""partnumber"":""21500-3"",""upc"":""810065210111"",""shortdescription"":""2001-2004 LB7 Duramax"",""description"":""The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance tuner and monitor combo for 2001–2007 GM 6.6L Duramax LB7, LLY, and LBZ trucks, delivering big power, unmatched safety, and total control in one package. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude transforms your Silverado or Sierra into a towing, hauling, or performance machine with just the touch of a button.

Featuring true on-the-fly tuning adjustments through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 color touchscreen monitor, this system allows you to instantly switch between multiple power levels to match your driving needs. Built-in safety backdowns automatically safeguard your engine and transmission by monitoring critical parameters, ensuring reliable performance even under extreme conditions. The CTS3 monitor gives you full visibility into your Duramax with customizable digital gauges, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs) on the spot.

Whether you’re towing a heavy load, daily driving, or building a street/strip Duramax, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 delivers responsive throttle control, improved drivability, and reliable, emissions-friendly power.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning expertise, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 for LB7, LLY, and LBZ Duramax trucks is the proven performance solution, combining power, safety, and control with the industry’s most advanced Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance tuner and monitor combo for 2001–2007 GM 6.6L Duramax LB7, LLY, and LBZ trucks, delivering big power, unmatched safety, and total control in one package. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude transforms your Silverado or Sierra into a towing, hauling, or performance machine with just the touch of a button.

column1: Featuring true on-the-fly tuning adjustments through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 color touchscreen monitor, this system allows you to instantly switch between multiple power levels to match your driving needs. Built-in safety backdowns automatically safeguard your engine and transmission by monitoring critical parameters, ensuring reliable performance even under extreme conditions. The CTS3 monitor gives you full visibility into your Duramax with customizable digital gauges, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs) on the spot.

Whether you’re towing a heavy load, daily driving, or building a street/strip Duramax, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 delivers responsive throttle control, improved drivability, and reliable, emissions-friendly power.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning expertise, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 for LB7, LLY, and LBZ Duramax trucks is the proven performance solution, combining power, safety, and control with the industry’s most advanced monitor.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Pulsar V3 w/ Edge Insight CTS3"",""partnumber"":""22602-3"",""upc"":""810065210807"",""shortdescription"":""2017-2019 Chevrolet Silverado/GMC Sierra 2500/3500"",""description"":""The Edge Pulsar V3 for 2017–2023 GM 6.6L L5P Duramax is the ultimate inline performance module, delivering massive emissions friendly power gains with zero hassle. Featuring a true plug-and-play design, the Pulsar V3 installs in minutes with no cutting, splicing, or wiring required, and it’s just as easy to remove, leaving no trace for warranty work.

Take complete control of your Duramax with on-the-fly power level adjustments directly from your factory steering wheel controls, no need for extra switches or bulky controllers. The Pulsar V3 also features a built-in throttle sensitivity booster for instant throttle response and a more aggressive driving experience, whether you’re towing heavy loads, daily driving, or pushing your truck on the open road.

Designed with state-of-the-art standalone ECU-style technology, the Pulsar V3 gives you advanced control and safety. With integrated safety backdowns, your engine is always protected while still enjoying maximum performance. You can also calibrate for larger tires and make TPMS adjustments with ease.

For drivers who demand more from their trucks, the Edge Pulsar V3 is the proven performance solution—combining unmatched power, reliability, and control for the modern Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra diesel trucks.

Pair it with an Edge Insight CTS3 monitor for even more features and control.

*When physically changing ring and pinion gears in the late model GM trucks, the factory cruise control will be disabled. While the Pulsar will allow you to recalibrate the speedometer for that gear change, it will not re-activate the disabled cruise control system. GM has this feature laced into the engine calibration files and would require full ECM tuning to enable cruise Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Pulsar V3 for 2017–2023 GM 6.6L L5P Duramax is the ultimate inline performance module, delivering massive emissions friendly power gains with zero hassle. Featuring a true plug-and-play design, the Pulsar V3 installs in minutes with no cutting, splicing, or wiring required, and it’s just as easy to remove, leaving no trace for warranty work.

column1: Take complete control of your Duramax with on-the-fly power level adjustments directly from your factory steering wheel controls, no need for extra switches or bulky controllers. The Pulsar V3 also features a built-in throttle sensitivity booster for instant throttle response and a more aggressive driving experience, whether you’re towing heavy loads, daily driving, or pushing your truck on the open road.

Designed with state-of-the-art standalone ECU-style technology, the Pulsar V3 gives you advanced control and safety. With integrated safety backdowns, your engine is always protected while still enjoying maximum performance. You can also calibrate for larger tires and make TPMS adjustments with ease.

For drivers who demand more from their trucks, the Edge Pulsar V3 is the proven performance solution—combining unmatched power, reliability, and control for the modern Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra diesel trucks.
Pair it with an Edge Insight CTS3 monitor for even more features and control.

*When physically changing ring and pinion gears in the late model GM trucks, the factory cruise control will be disabled. While the Pulsar will allow you to recalibrate the speedometer for that gear change, it will not re-activate the disabled cruise control system. GM has this feature laced into the engine calibration files and would require full ECM tuning to enable cruise again.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

,{""name"":""Edge Juice w/ Attitude CTS3"",""partnumber"":""31507-3"",""upc"":""810065210210"",""shortdescription"":""2013-2018 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 - 6.7L Cummins Diesel"",""description"":""The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

column1: What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and control.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""EZX Module"",""partnumber"":""22710"",""upc"":""810065217103"",""shortdescription"":""2020-2022 GM 1500 - 3.0L Duramax Diesel"",""description"":""Unlock the hidden potential of your 2020–2022 Chevy Silverado or GMC Sierra 1500 3.0L LM2 Duramax with the Edge EZX module, the ultimate plug-and-play performance upgrade for diesel truck owners who want more power, better drivability, and total confidence. The EZX installs in minutes using factory-style connections and can be removed just as easily, leaving no trace behind for warranty work. Built with emissions friendly tuning, this module delivers noticeable horsepower and torque gains that transform your Duramax into a stronger, more responsive truck on the road.

Designed with both daily drivers and towing applications in mind, the EZX improves throttle response, eliminates turbo lag, and delivers smoother, more confident power when hauling or passing. Using the Edge EZX smartphone app, you can adjust power levels instantly on the fly, fine tune throttle sensitivity, and even recalibrate for larger tire sizes to keep your speedometer accurate after upgrades. The app also gives you access to convenient features like disabling the annoying factory auto start/stop system, providing greater control and a more enjoyable driving experience.

Backed by Edge’s 20+ years of diesel performance expertise, the EZX for GM 1500 3.0L LM2 Duramax is the perfect upgrade for drivers who demand reliable power, improved towing capability, and modern convenience—all while staying compliant and worry-free.

If you're looking for the total driving experience, checkout the EZX+Insight CTS3 kit also available, part number provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Unlock the hidden potential of your 2020–2022 Chevy Silverado or GMC Sierra 1500 3.0L LM2 Duramax with the Edge EZX module, the ultimate plug-and-play performance upgrade for diesel truck owners who want more power, better drivability, and total confidence. The EZX installs in minutes using factory-style connections and can be removed just as easily, leaving no trace behind for warranty work. Built with emissions friendly tuning, this module delivers noticeable horsepower and torque gains that transform your Duramax into a stronger, more responsive truck on the road.

column1: Designed with both daily drivers and towing applications in mind, the EZX improves throttle response, eliminates turbo lag, and delivers smoother, more confident power when hauling or passing. Using the Edge EZX smartphone app, you can adjust power levels instantly on the fly, fine tune throttle sensitivity, and even recalibrate for larger tire sizes to keep your speedometer accurate after upgrades. The app also gives you access to convenient features like disabling the annoying factory auto start/stop system, providing greater control and a more enjoyable driving experience.

Backed by Edge’s 20+ years of diesel performance expertise, the EZX for GM 1500 3.0L LM2 Duramax is the perfect upgrade for drivers who demand reliable power, improved towing capability, and modern convenience—all while staying compliant and worry-free.

If you're looking for the total driving experience, checkout the EZX+Insight CTS3 kit also available, part number 23710-3",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Edge Juice w/ Attitude CTS3"",""partnumber"":""31504-3"",""upc"":""810065210197"",""shortdescription"":""2006-2007 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 - 5.9L Cummins Diesel"",""description"":""The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,7,Emissions,"This part is legal under the provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

column1: What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and control.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude transforms your Silverado or Sierra into a towing, hauling, or performance machine with just the touch of a button.

Featuring true on-the-fly tuning adjustments through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 color touchscreen monitor, this system allows you to instantly switch between multiple power levels to match your driving needs. Built-in safety backdowns automatically safeguard your engine and transmission by monitoring critical parameters, ensuring reliable performance even under extreme conditions. The CTS3 monitor gives you full visibility into your Duramax with customizable digital gauges, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs) on the spot.

Whether you’re towing a heavy load, daily driving, or building a street/strip Duramax, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 delivers responsive throttle control, improved drivability, and reliable, emissions-friendly power.

legal under the provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance tuner and monitor combo for 2001–2007 GM 6.6L Duramax LB7, LLY, and LBZ trucks, delivering big power, unmatched safety, and total control in one package. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude transforms your Silverado or Sierra into a towing, hauling, or performance machine with just the touch of a button.

Featuring true on-the-fly tuning adjustments through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 color touchscreen monitor, this system allows you to instantly switch between multiple power levels to match your driving needs. Built-in safety backdowns automatically safeguard your engine and transmission by monitoring critical parameters, ensuring reliable performance even under extreme conditions. The CTS3 monitor gives you full visibility into your Duramax with customizable digital gauges, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs) on the spot.

Whether you’re towing a heavy load, daily driving, or building a street/strip Duramax, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 delivers responsive throttle control, improved drivability, and reliable, emissions-friendly power.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning expertise, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 for LB7, LLY, and LBZ Duramax trucks is the proven performance solution, combining power, safety, and control with the industry’s most advanced monitor.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Edge Evolution CS2"",""partnumber"":""85350"",""upc"":""810115011743"",""shortdescription"":""Gas Tuner/Monitor - 50 State Legal"",""description"":""The Edge Evolution CS2 is the perfect budget-minded performance tuner and monitor for Ford F-150, Chevy Silverado, Ram HEMI trucks, and popular SUVs like the Expedition, Tahoe, and Escalade. Combining proven flash tuning with a compact digital display, the Evolution CS2 delivers safe, 50-state emissions-compliant power gains designed to improve horsepower, torque, fuel economy, and drivability. With preloaded tuning levels optimized for daily driving, towing, fuel savings, and performance, the CS2 gives gas truck and SUV owners the flexibility to tune their vehicle to match their needs.

Simple to install and easy to use, the Evolution CS2 plugs into your factory OBD-II port to quickly reflash the ECM. Once your calibration is set, you can unplug the device and store it away—yet still take advantage of the built-in monitoring features whenever you choose. The color screen provides real-time data on critical parameters, customizable gauge layouts, and the ability to read and clear DTCs (diagnostic trouble codes) on the fly.

Whether you’re looking for more confident passing power, smoother towing performance, or better fuel mileage on your commute, the Edge Evolution CS2 is a cost-effective way to upgrade your gas-powered truck or SUV. Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of tuning expertise, it’s the smart choice for owners who want reliable gains and monitoring in one compact column2: Instructions - techlibrary_d-541-6.pdf", Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,1,Emissions,"This part is legal for sale and use on Emissions Controlled Vehicles, in all 50 states, when used in accordance with the manufacturers application guide because it has a California Air Resources Board (CARB) Executive Order (EO) number.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Evolution CS2 is the perfect budget-minded performance tuner and monitor for Ford F-150, Chevy Silverado, Ram HEMI trucks, and popular SUVs like the Expedition, Tahoe, and Escalade. Combining proven flash tuning with a compact digital display, the Evolution CS2 delivers safe, 50-state emissions-compliant power gains designed to improve horsepower, torque, fuel economy, and drivability. With preloaded tuning levels optimized for daily driving, towing, fuel savings, and performance, the CS2 gives gas truck and SUV owners the flexibility to tune their vehicle to match their needs.

column1: Simple to install and easy to use, the Evolution CS2 plugs into your factory OBD-II port to quickly reflash the ECM. Once your calibration is set, you can unplug the device and store it away—yet still take advantage of the built-in monitoring features whenever you choose. The color screen provides real-time data on critical parameters, customizable gauge layouts, and the ability to read and clear DTCs (diagnostic trouble codes) on the fly.

Whether you’re looking for more confident passing power, smoother towing performance, or better fuel mileage on your commute, the Edge Evolution CS2 is a cost-effective way to upgrade your gas-powered truck or SUV. Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of tuning expertise, it’s the smart choice for owners who want reliable gains and monitoring in one compact device.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",VEHICLE SPECIFIC ATTRIBUTES,SPECS,EMISSIONS,1,TECH RESOURCES,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

Our first flow-formed 6-lug truck wheel, the CS45 is a precision-engineered blend of lightweight performance and rugged durability. Independently tested to exceed SAE J2530 standards and load-rated to 2500 lbs, this wheel can take any abuse you can throw at your truck. Available in three unique finish combinations: Silver w\/Gloss Black inserts, Black w\/Silver Inserts, and Solid Gloss Black, and offered in two sizes: 20\""x 9\"" and 22\""x 9.5\"". doesn't matter if you use your F150 for cruising the streets, hauling cargo, or ripping across the desert, the CS45 from Carroll Shelby Wheel Company will look right at home on your truck. Our first flow-formed 6-lug truck wheel, the CS45 is a precision-engineered blend of lightweight performance and rugged durability. Independently tested to exceed SAE J2530 standards and load-rated to 2500 lbs, this wheel can take any abuse you can throw at your truck. Available in three unique finish combinations: Silver w/Gloss Black inserts, Black w/Silver Inserts, and Solid Gloss Black, and offered in two sizes: 20""x 9"" and 22""x 9.5"". The CS45 will look perfect on any truck - on the road and off it.",About Carroll Shelby Wheels,Find Carroll Shelby wheels for late-model Mustangs and F-150s Trucks at Holley.com!,SPECS,SERVICE PARTS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Evolution CTS3 - 50 State Legal"",""partnumber"":""85401-101"",""upc"":""810065210012"",""shortdescription"":""The Evolution CTS3 for Ford Powerstroke delivers powerful tuning, a sleek touchscreen, and real-time engine monitoring. Boost towing power, throttle response, and efficiency with this premium all-in-one tuner and performance upgrade."",""description"":""Take your Ford Power Stroke to the next level with the Edge Evolution CTS3, the most advanced in-cabin tuner and digital monitor available for 1999–2019 Ford diesel applications. Built for real truck owners who demand power, reliability, and compliance, the CTS3 offers dyno-proven performance gains, emissions-compliant calibrations, and an industry-leading touchscreen display—all in one sleek device.

The Evolution CTS3 for Ford Diesel comes with CARB Executive Order (EO) approval, making it 50-state legal for use on public roads. Enjoy peace of mind knowing your performance gains meet strict emissions standards without sacrificing power or drivability.

Broad Diesel Coverage

7.3L Power Stroke (1999–2003) – Proven gains for Ford’s legendary workhorse.

6.0L Power Stroke (2003–2007) – Improved drivability, towing confidence, and reliability.

6.4L Power Stroke (2008–2010) – Cleaner, stronger power delivery with optimized fueling.

6.7L Power Stroke (2011–2019) – State-of-the-art tuning for Ford’s modern diesel powerhouse.

Expandability with EAS Accessories

The CTS3 isn’t just a tuner—it’s a modular digital gauge platform. With the Edge Accessory System (EAS), you can expand monitoring capabilities to fit your exact needs. Add sensors like:

EGT Pyrometer Kits – Keep exhaust temps in check when towing or running higher power levels.

Pressure Sensors – Monitor boost, fuel, or oil pressure for added safety and performance insight.

Temperature Sensors – Track temps in vital components like transmission fluid, differential, or engine oil. The EAS system plugs directly into the CTS3, allowing you to daisy-chain multiple sensors and display them in real time on the touchscreen.

The Evolution CTS3 for Ford Diesel is more than just a tuner—it’s an all-in-one performance upgrade, gauge cluster, and diagnostic tool that transforms the way you drive your Power Stroke. With tuning that’s emissions-compliant, dyno-proven, and tailored to Ford’s most popular diesel platforms, the CTS3 is the smart choice for truck owners who want legal power and total control.

Compatible with 1999–2019 Ford Super Duty trucks equipped with 7.3L, 6.0L, 6.4L, and 6.7L Power Stroke Diesel California Air Resources Board (CARB) Executive Order (EO) number.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Take your Ford Power Stroke to the next level with the Edge Evolution CTS3, the most advanced in-cabin tuner and digital monitor available for 1999–2019 Ford diesel applications. Built for real truck owners who demand power, reliability, and compliance, the CTS3 offers dyno-proven performance gains, emissions-compliant calibrations, and an industry-leading touchscreen display—all in one sleek device.

column1: The Evolution CTS3 for Ford Diesel comes with CARB Executive Order (EO) approval, making it 50-state legal for use on public roads. Enjoy peace of mind knowing your performance gains meet strict emissions standards without sacrificing power or drivability.
7.3L Power Stroke (1999–2003) – Proven gains for Ford’s legendary workhorse.
6.0L Power Stroke (2003–2007) – Improved drivability, towing confidence, and reliability.
6.4L Power Stroke (2008–2010) – Cleaner, stronger power delivery with optimized fueling.
6.7L Power Stroke (2011–2019) – State-of-the-art tuning for Ford’s modern diesel powerhouse.
The CTS3 isn’t just a tuner—it’s a modular digital gauge platform. With the Edge Accessory System (EAS), you can expand monitoring capabilities to fit your exact needs. Add sensors like:
EGT Pyrometer Kits – Keep exhaust temps in check when towing or running higher power levels.
Pressure Sensors – Monitor boost, fuel, or oil pressure for added safety and performance insight.

Temperature Sensors – Track temps in vital components like transmission fluid, differential, or engine oil. The EAS system plugs directly into the CTS3, allowing you to daisy-chain multiple sensors and display them in real time on the touchscreen.

The Evolution CTS3 for Ford Diesel is more than just a tuner—it’s an all-in-one performance upgrade, gauge cluster, and diagnostic tool that transforms the way you drive your Power Stroke. With tuning that’s emissions-compliant, dyno-proven, and tailored to Ford’s most popular diesel platforms, the CTS3 is the smart choice for truck owners who want legal power and total control.

Compatible with 1999–2019 Ford Super Duty trucks equipped with 7.3L, 6.0L, 6.4L, and 6.7L Power Stroke Diesel engines.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

,{""name"":""Edge Juice w/ Attitude CTS3"",""partnumber"":""31503-3"",""upc"":""810065210180"",""shortdescription"":""2004.5-2005 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 - 5.9L Cummins Diesel"",""description"":""The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

column1: What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and control.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

When installed along with a Sniper 1 EFI system, the combination creates the easiest conversion to install on the market, with only four connections required. Our harness only requires one connection to a switched 12V, battery+, battery-, and fuel pump power. The pre-terminated connectors and a built-in 40A relay provide power to all of the components within the system. With the main harness included, you no longer need to run multiple wires to provide switched\u00a012V\u00a0for each individual component. Route the harness and pre-terminated connectors to your HyperSpark coil, distributor, and ignition box and plug them in."",""metadescription"":null,""productnotes"":"""",""installationnotes"":""This is a cast distributor gear, it is recommended to consult your camshaft manufacturer prior to installation to confirm what distributor gear material they require. When changing distributor gears, it is critical to measure the shaft diameter OD and gear ID, before installing the new gear on the shaft. column2: Instructions - 199R11525.pdf", Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,3,Emissions,,See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Our HyperSpark kits were designed to make upgrading your ignition on a Sniper 1 EFI equipped engine simple. When installed along with a Sniper 1 EFI system, the combination creates the easiest conversion to install on the market, with only four connections required. Our harness only requires one connection to a switched 12V, battery+, battery-, and fuel pump power. The pre-terminated connectors and a built-in 40A relay provide power to all of the components within the system. With the main harness included, you no longer need to run multiple wires to provide switched 12V for each individual component. Route the harness and pre-terminated connectors to your HyperSpark coil, distributor, and ignition box and plug them in.",,,SPECS,SERVICE PARTS,EMISSIONS,3,TECH RESOURCES,WARRANTY INFORMATION,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

column15:
,{""name"":""Cataclean - Fuel and Exhaust System Cleaner - Gasoline - 8 oz."",""partnumber"":""120020CAT"",""upc"":""090127807248"",""shortdescription"":""Small engine/Powersports application in a convenient 8 ounce bottle"",""description"":""Cataclean is a patented EPA-approved complete engine, fuel, and exhaust system cleaner that reduces carbon build-up and cleans cylinder heads. Cataclean does not alter fuel composition and is safe for gasoline, diesel, and hybrid engines. Testing at an independent emissions testing facility showed using Cataclean can lower your total hydrocarbon emissions (Performance results are dependent on driver habits and vehicle condition.)

Use Cataclean in small engines, such as lawn mowers, blowers, weed trimmers, and more. Also great for Powersports, such as UTVs, motorcycles, jet skis, and more.

Perfect to use one 8 ounce bottle in a fuel tank (if approximately 1 or 2 gallons) then use/run as normal for at least 15 minutes and refuel when necessary.

For best results, we recommend adding one 8 oz. Cataclean bottle into approximately 1-2 gallons of fuel (16:1 or 32:1 mix ratio) and after any prolonged storage."",""metadescription"":null,""productnotes"":"""",""installationnotes"":""Pour entire content of bottle into fuel tank then drive for at least 15 minutes and refuel when necessary.  For best results it is recommended to add one bottle of CATACLEAN&reg, LIQUID SCIENCE to approximately 1/4 tank of fuel. Vehicles with a Capless Fuel Tank System should use the manufacturer supplied funnel (or equivalent) while dispensing Cataclean. Use four times a year to help maintain proper engine operation and catalytic converter efficiency.  One application may not clean an already unhealthy catalytic converter, but the recommended four times per year usage can restore a dirty catalytic converter, maintain a healthy catalytic converter and support a well-running engine."",""keywords"":""cataclean, reduced emissions, check engine light, catalytic converter cleaner, carbon build up, o2 sensor, fuel injector, engine cleaner, top end column15:
,{""name"":""DiabloSport PULSAR"",""partnumber"":""32451"",""upc"":""810115017882"",""shortdescription"":""Fits 2015-2018 Ram 1500 5.7L Hemi"",""description"":""If you've shopped for performance upgrades for you '15-UP RAM 5.7L truck, odds are you've come to the realization that ""tuning"" these trucks is easier said than done. DiabloSport offers a PCM swap for the 15-UP HEMI 1500 trucks, but we're well aware that consumers are interested in other options to add performance. Pulsar is a new, innovative product that has been engineered to keep your PCM on the truck with no flash tuning, or removal of the computer itself, required. Pulsar is an in-line computer that connects directly to the vehicle PCM, with no additional wiring harness (do we have your attention yet?!). Better yet, the Pulsar for Ram is 50 state legal!



The 32451 supports 2015-2018 5.7 Ram 1500 models as well as 2019-2024 5.7 Ram 1500 Classic Out of the 4 modes tow seems to work best for me, but is fun to turn it up to performance every now and then.

I install the pulsar 32453 on the 2019  ram 1500 8-speed New body, and has a problem of ignition.  It takes time to turn on.  Turn on the check engine.  I already updated the software and the problem persists.   now remove the pulsar of the truck and everything is working fine

What can I do to solve the problem?"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-08-07 03:17:37"",""updateddate"":""August 7, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":2132,""customerid"":204665,""firstname"":""PETER"",""lastname"":""GETSON"",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""March 22, 2021"",""title"":""Puslar"",""reviewtext"":""Great product and easy to install ! Gas mileage average is 1/2 mile less per gallon than stock on first tank of gas."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2018-12-29 05:39:20"",""updateddate"":""December 29, 2018"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3190,""customerid"":415928,""firstname"":""Aaron mcC"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""1"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""February 5, 2019"",""title"":""check engine limp mode"",""reviewtext"":""i bought this 3 months ago and tested it out on a 3000 mile trip across the US for my job. 
This unit set off a check engine light and/or put it into limp mode everyday. This item is useless if you want to use wide open throttle ever example highway merge at 70 stomped to 80 mph posted speed. Biggest waste of money huge disappointment"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-02-05 16:19:09"",""updateddate"":""February 5, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3191,""customerid"":415929,""firstname"":""Rich G"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""January 15, 2020"",""title"":""Very User Friendly"",""reviewtext"":""I have had this product installed for about a month now. Runs very seamless with Pedal Commander"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-01-15 17:31:46"",""updateddate"":""January 15, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3192,""customerid"":415930,""firstname"":""RAM Rebel"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""2"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""June 13, 2019"",""title"":""Easy install and usability. Poor fuel economy."",""reviewtext"":""I bought this mostly for the Economy mode. 
I drive a lot and was hoping for .5 to 1.0 mpg on the highway. Instead i got a decrease of 2 mpg. I actually get the best highway economy (still only 15.2mpg)  in performance mode. 
It seems the only thing this is good for is to burn your tires in performance mode. And that only seems the throttle is remapped so that 1% throttle pedal is 90% throttle request. Actually makes it hard to drive when 1/4 inch pedal travel spins the tires.
Even in stock mode fuel economy is about 2mpg lower.
Very dissatisfied and disappointed with my purchase.

It gets 2 stars because 1: the ease of controlling the modes on the fly via steering wheel controls is the only way to go! And 2: performance mode does work.

I have driven nearly 2k miles with this installed and checked mileage via odometer. Not just going by the cluster display (which are within .3mpg)"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-06-13 09:39:16"",""updateddate"":""June 13, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3193,""customerid"":415931,""firstname"":""Bob hemiman"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""July 16, 2018"",""title"":""It’s a great programer"",""reviewtext"":""I though about it looked at reviews about the pulsar an pulled the trigger on it.hoping that they come out with some way to do some adjustments with it."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2018-07-16 01:32:30"",""updateddate"":""July 16, 2018"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3194,""customerid"":415932,""firstname"":""SHANTZ"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""June 14, 2019"",""title"":""Love the on the fly in dash control"",""reviewtext"":""Power, sensitivity, and in eco mode im getting 23 mpg with a hemi on 37s hahahahaha who needs a prius. 450hp 4x4 getting 20plus mpg and then when you want the power just tap a few buttons and peel them tires off. Love it"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-06-14 13:00:56"",""updateddate"":""June 14, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3195,""customerid"":415933,""firstname"":""Bradyl"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""August 13, 2022"",""title"":""Amazing product"",""reviewtext"":""Install was simple and the results were immediately noticeable!!!!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2022-08-13 13:13:56"",""updateddate"":""August 13, 2022"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3196,""customerid"":415934,""firstname"":""RevnRam"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""October 23, 2018"",""title"":""Great Programmer"",""reviewtext"":""This programmer is amazing and I would buy it again and again! Purchased about a month ago and I love the ease of use and the Econ (23 mpg) and Tow (pass everything but a gas station) modes. The Performance mode leaves a little to be desired: I've only run 93 since I purchased the truck and I have a CA intake and cat back exhaust. If you floor the right pedal, it bogs down the engine, but if you stay around 3/4 foot travel she'll definitely move. Definitely going to be getting a custom tune when that option is available!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2018-10-23 12:24:54"",""updateddate"":""October 23, 2018"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3197,""customerid"":415935,""firstname"":""Get right"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""January 27, 2019"",""title"":""Beast"",""reviewtext"":""Pulsar was a great investment for my 15 ram 5.7 hemi"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-01-27 18:15:25"",""updateddate"":""January 27, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3198,""customerid"":415936,""firstname"":""Joe123"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""April 4, 2021"",""title"":""Wakes your Hemi up"",""reviewtext"":""Easy to install and use. It's amazing how you can adjust through the different power settings so effortlessly. You can actually feel the difference as you switch settings. I recommend this highly."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-04-04 22:23:09"",""updateddate"":""April 4, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3199,""customerid"":415937,""firstname"":""ChrisRN"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""4"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""November 4, 2019"",""title"":""Works well."",""reviewtext"":""I bought this almost a month ago and was sceptical at first. The install wasn't to bad except the cable levers on the PCM aren't as easy to remove as in the video, they stuck and took a lot of gentle manipulation to get them to release. At first I didn't notice much improvement until I put 91 octane in. I have a 6 inch lift and 35"" tires, flowmaster exhaust and k&n cold air intake on my 2018 Ram 1500 Crew Cab short bed. In performance mode it now chirps the tires and the exhaust sounds deeper. My only complaint is the gas pedal is very touchy coming from a stop at a light, almost too responsive. I also have not seen a difference in fuel economy while in Eco mode, even with higher octane fuel. Additionally I can't seem to register the product because I can't find it on the product list. Plus no cable to do the upgrade, which is recommended out of the box per the installation instructions. I hope the future programming allows for customization for bolt on items like air intake and exhaust like the video says are coming."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-11-04 18:40:45"",""updateddate"":""November 4, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3200,""customerid"":415938,""firstname"":""Jaejae"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""1"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""April 23, 2019"",""title"":""Causing issues"",""reviewtext"":""I had this professionally installed and since my truck has stalled while driving 3 times. My truck is a 2016 and I have never had any issues with it before."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-04-23 12:36:29"",""updateddate"":""April 23, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3201,""customerid"":415939,""firstname"":""Cstan"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""4"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""June 16, 2019"",""title"":""Works great."",""reviewtext"":""After having this on my 2018 Ram for about a week now, I can say I thoroughly enjoy the kick in the pants that the performance mode gives the truck.  It's a bit touchy to be used as an everyday option but it's fun to use when you need the extra ""go"". I keep it in tow mode for a middle ground between stock and performance.  A lot more ""drivability"" there.  I am however quite a bit disappointed in the MDS off modes.  It doesn't actually turn it off.  Instead it kicks it off as soon as it turns on, and continues to do so over and over and over.  So, you are left with a constantly repeating surge cycle of on/off.  This was my main reason for purchasing and I still have to manually put it into ""8"" on the gear selector to keep the MDS off.  I know there's only so much a piggyback system can do and in the future I believe they will fix this with an update. The biggest surprise is my favorite mode of use is the Economy, once at highway speeds the truck performs better than stock under the same conditions ( it is lazier from a stand still, than stock, but I  expected that) and have gotten over 25 mpg on  WV. secondary roads (55 mph) I think this is a great product. But keep your expectations reasonable, your not going to break speed records, but you will enjoy your ride a lot more !"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-08-18 12:42:10"",""updateddate"":""August 18, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3206,""customerid"":415944,""firstname"":""Barber"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""March 30, 2020"",""title"":""Best Modification Ever Done to my Ram 1500"",""reviewtext"":""I was very skeptical about adding this to my truck, especially because my dad was borrowing it the next day to pick up his new camper that was 700 miles away in Ohio, but I figured it’d help him with towing through the mountains of Pennsylvania. 2 hours into his ride out to get the camper he called me saying how awesome the power was, keep in mind he was still in New York, and he wasn’t even towing anything yet! He said at 70 mph he could just tap the gas and the truck would pull like a sports car, and he was only in Tow tune with MDS off! Now that I’ve been driving it, I am blown away at the performance of the Pulsar! I usually drive in Tow Mode MDS off, but I also use Eco MDS off, and Stock MDS off quite a bit! I’ve thrown it in Performance MDS off a few times on 91 octane, but I usually save that for long straightaways! Best money I’ve spent on my truck!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-03-30 00:24:24"",""updateddate"":""March 30, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3207,""customerid"":415945,""firstname"":""Dan84"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""February 9, 2019"",""title"":""Works great"",""reviewtext"":""Bought this about two months ago and couldn't be happier. I am currently testing in performance mode with MDS off and it's simply awesome, response is much faster then stock and pulls throughout entire band very well.  Low to mid range is insane.  Thank You again."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-10-09 21:04:47"",""updateddate"":""October 9, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3217,""customerid"":415955,""firstname"":""MKG_Force"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""July 4, 2020"",""title"":""It’s the real deal!"",""reviewtext"":""The Pulsar was the last of three upgrades on my 2017 Ram 1500 Limited.  Started with AFE Momentous CAI.  Followed up with Borla Touring Exhaust.  After installing the Pulsar, I concluded my stock PCM was having difficulty adjusting to the mods.  Although my MPG increased buy 2 MPGs, the performance was sluggish.
After installing the Pulsar everything came together.  The Performance with MDS off really wakes up the HEMI.  It is extremely responsive and quick of the start.  The gear change is perfectly timed resulting in much better performance.  Definitely a different vehicle in this mode.
The economy mode with MDS off is also great for cruising around town.  After one day, I’ve gain an additional 1 MPG.  Even in this mode, the Hemi is more responsive with very smooth gear changes, but calls the horses if you punch it.  Loving the Pulsar and my Hemi Truck!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-07-04 22:05:11"",""updateddate"":""July 4, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3218,""customerid"":415956,""firstname"":""Jochanan"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""October 8, 2018"",""title"":""Impressed"",""reviewtext"":""I installed my Pulsar, idled out of my garage... put it on setting 5 and gave my normal amount of gas... the tires broke loose and spun!  The change in pedal response was incredible.  My Hemi has been transformed from a mediocre pickup truck to a responsive stallion that's fun to drive!!  I haven't noticed an increase in fuel efficiency because I've been enjoying the way my truck behaves when I give it the gas... maybe after I've had my fill of this setting i'll put it on ""economy"" and see what I get in the line of fuel savings, for now... I prefer the response than the economy."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2018-10-08 15:55:56"",""updateddate"":""October 8, 2018"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3219,""customerid"":415957,""firstname"":""GMagacJr"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""March 18, 2019"",""title"":""Awesome Product!!!!!!"",""reviewtext"":""I bought the Pulsar for my 2018 RAM Sport. Saw big difference right away also quick power response over all in my opinion it’s a great device at least for my truck!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-11-01 18:33:22"",""updateddate"":""November 1, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3223,""customerid"":415961,""firstname"":""Jay2019"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""March 25, 2019"",""title"":""Edge pulsar"",""reviewtext"":""I bought the pulsar with the intent to get better fuel mileage and a little boost in power for my 2016 ram 1500 and it does just that. I'm able to switch from economy mode to performance within seconds while driving when I want a little more power. Great product, nice packaging, arrived fairly quick. I recomend the edge pulsar to anyone that wants a little extra out of there truck for a good price."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-03-25 16:48:29"",""updateddate"":""March 25, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3224,""customerid"":415962,""firstname"":""JustJon"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""2"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""October 23, 2019"",""title"":""Great features, but triggered my check engine ligh"",""reviewtext"":""I have had the Pulsar on my 2017 Ram 1500 for about a month. After a couple of weeks and maybe ~400 miles, the check engine light came on with a message stating: ""service the electronic throttle control system."" 

I subsequently unhooked the battery and left it unhooked for about 30 minutes. When I reattached the battery, the service message was cleared, however, the check engine light stayed on for about 10 or so miles, then the light turned off. It's been fine for about a week without any issues. I hope this isn't something that continues to happen since this product was not exactly cheap.

Otherwise, the product does exactly what I wanted. With my custom exhaust, I hated MDS, and this product seems to keep MDS from kicking on just fine."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-10-23 21:33:40"",""updateddate"":""October 23, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3225,""customerid"":415963,""firstname"":""Jdk9923"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""January 7, 2019"",""title"":""It a is night and day difference"",""reviewtext"":""I keep it on tow with mds on, I drove over 500 miles right after putting it in on the interstate in performance with mds on and still averaged 21.5 mpg at 75mph average."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-01-07 16:30:28"",""updateddate"":""January 7, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3226,""customerid"":415964,""firstname"":""Jdstealth"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""December 3, 2019"",""title"":""Great for ease of options"",""reviewtext"":""I own a dodge magnum and use the trinity tuner from diablo sport. If you want custom or 3rd party tuning do the unlocked pcm and trinity tuner. Overall This is a great option to have some get up in a stock truck. I'm happy with it!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-12-03 20:52:42"",""updateddate"":""December 3, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3227,""customerid"":415965,""firstname"":""Black Knight"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""April 10, 2019"",""title"":""This is awesome"",""reviewtext"":""An easy upgrade to install and gives a wide range of driving experiences, from the stock to the performance with MDS off, this has really helped my towing ability in my 2018 Ram"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-04-10 01:06:05"",""updateddate"":""April 10, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3228,""customerid"":415966,""firstname"":""Moperider"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""October 28, 2019"",""title"":""Releases the fun in driving your Ram!"",""reviewtext"":""This product made my Ram 1500 drive like a beast.  The throttle response on Performance mode is amazing, completely changes the personality of the truck.

My favorite part is how it integrates seamlessly into the truck's computer system allowing you to change driving performance profiles at the push of a button and the in dash display like modern sports vehicles.

Installation is especially easy.

Best part is you can deactivate MDS!

Wish I would have found this earlier!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-10-28 17:50:18"",""updateddate"":""October 28, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3229,""customerid"":415967,""firstname"":""Hemi16"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""May 29, 2021"",""title"":""A must have for a Hemi!"",""reviewtext"":""I've had this product for over two weeks and I absolutely love it! Easy to install and easy to use."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-06-25 02:58:12"",""updateddate"":""June 25, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3250,""customerid"":415987,""firstname"":""Rattleronu"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""4"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""June 26, 2018"",""title"":""Select power on the fly"",""reviewtext"":""I bought my Pulsar about a month ago and the power gain is very noticeable on all 8 power levels. If you have it on 8 you better hang on because the throttle response is immediate and even with the traction control on it will break the tires loose and you have to go light on the pedal or it will jerk you around . For around town driving I prefer level 5 or 6 because i still get good power gain but it is much smoother going from a full stop and going through the gears. On the open road i selected power level 3 and got 22 miles to the gallon going from Phoenix to Los Angeles. The unit is very easy to install, 10 minutes max. The only gripe i have is that it doesn't allow you to remove the speed governor of 110 miles per hour like a hand held unit allows you to. So you're going to get to 110 mph in neck breaking speed and that's it. Wish it had a speed governor disable. Other than that it works flawlessly."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2018-06-26 13:46:41"",""updateddate"":""June 26, 2018"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3251,""customerid"":415988,""firstname"":""RODSTER"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""October 4, 2018"",""title"":""GREAT PIECE"",""reviewtext"":""INSTALLED ON CUSTOMER VEH, NERT USER FRIENDLY CUST LOVES IT"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2018-10-04 13:27:09"",""updateddate"":""October 4, 2018"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3252,""customerid"":415989,""firstname"":""copperhead17"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""April 13, 2020"",""title"":""Awesome product !!!"",""reviewtext"":""Very pleased with my purchase .Awesome throttle response.Completely different truck the way it reacts.."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-04-13 22:21:35"",""updateddate"":""April 13, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3253,""customerid"":415990,""firstname"":""Rigs64"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""July 28, 2018"",""title"":""Pulsar module 2015-2018 Ram 1500 5.7l Hemi"",""reviewtext"":""I am so impressed with this product! Forget thenew heads, Cam, etc. For less than $1,000 and under 1hr, I have a daily driver that will boil the tires with traction control disengaged."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-11-27 00:30:18"",""updateddate"":""November 27, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3262,""customerid"":415998,""firstname"":""ZEMTEK"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""September 10, 2021"",""title"":""Great product"",""reviewtext"":""Great product for the money. Easy installation. Thank you."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-01-03 17:09:04"",""updateddate"":""January 3, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3264,""customerid"":416000,""firstname"":""TJMack20"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""1"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""January 5, 2019"",""title"":""Disappointed"",""reviewtext"":""First the truck: 2016 Ram 1500 w/ 4” lift and 35” tires, K&N cold air intake and MBRP cat back exhaust. This has very easy installation and I’ve had no connection or control problems. I have not dyno’d the truck so I don’t have numbers to back up my statements only my perception. After several weeks of testing, trying different octane gas and taking a 2500 mile cross country trip I’ve come to the belief that the power this product produces is illusion. I believe all this does is change the gas pedal sensitivity. I have seen no improvement in MPG in economy mode either on the highway or in town but it certainly makes the fuel pedal less responsive. Tow mode is fun, very snappy pedal response but I wouldn’t say that it seems like there is actually any more power, it just reacts faster to pressing the pedal. “Performance mode” is something else. As far as I can tell it’s completly unusable unless you are drag racing or trying to rear end someone. The pedal response is immediate 5% press of the pedal is equal to 95% in stock, but it’s uncontrollable and unusable in any normal driving situation other than a completely open dry road. All in all, based on my experience, there is no indication of this being at all more efficient than the stock tuning. I believe the are much less expensive ways to get faster response from the gas pedal. It is not worth the cost in my opinion and I regret the purchase."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-01-05 03:32:29"",""updateddate"":""January 5, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3265,""customerid"":416001,""firstname"":""Robbie84"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""4"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""April 5, 2019"",""title"":""Very impressed!"",""reviewtext"":""I bought this item about a month ago, and install was a breeze. Instantly what stands out is throttle response and then once you drive it for a few days and play around with the performance mode you can really notice the power gain. If this product was $100 cheaper, and you had the option of erasing your speed governor I would have given this product 5 stars."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-04-05 19:37:23"",""updateddate"":""April 5, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32451"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3266,""customerid"":416002,""firstname"":""Matthw1211"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""May 9, 2019"",""title"":""Great product instant difference"",""reviewtext"":""Today I installed this product wasn't really expecting too much hp gain or throttle response. I was wrong I noticed an instant difference this is an amazing product. The only issue is that you have to mess with those PCM cables. They are Fragile and not as easy as the YouTube videos show. I didn't want to break anything so I took it to a tuner shop down the road and they knocked it out on 15 mins.

column2: Instructions - 75daa6ee71c914bf88bd6acc8e451f6ddb8c1dec.pdf", Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,1,Emissions,"This part is legal for sale and use on Emissions Controlled Vehicles, in all 50 states, when used in accordance with the manufacturers application guide because it has a California Air Resources Board (CARB) Executive Order (EO) number.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"If you've shopped for performance upgrades for you '15-UP RAM 5.7L truck, odds are you've come to the realization that ""tuning"" these trucks is easier said than done. DiabloSport offers a PCM swap for the 15-UP HEMI 1500 trucks, but we're well aware that consumers are interested in other options to add performance. Pulsar is a new, innovative product that has been engineered to keep your PCM on the truck with no flash tuning, or removal of the computer itself, required. Pulsar is an in-line computer that connects directly to the vehicle PCM, with no additional wiring harness (do we have your attention yet?!). Better yet, the Pulsar for Ram is 50 state legal!

column1: The 32451 supports 2015-2018 5.7 Ram 1500 models as well as 2019-2024 5.7 Ram 1500 Classic models!",About DiabloSport,"Shop the official DiabloSport site to view the Predator, inTune, and Trinity tuners and programmers for late-model GM, Ford, Dodge, Jeep, and Chrysler gas and diesel vehicles. ,{""name"":""Flowmaster Flow FX Cat-Back Exhaust System"",""partnumber"":""717857"",""upc"":""700042039173"",""shortdescription"":""Fits 2014-2019* (*Classic body only) GM Silverado/Sierra 1500 4.3L & 5.3L engines. - Moderate sound"",""description"":""Introducing the new Flow FX® Cat-back exhaust system for 2014-2019*(*Classic body 5.3L, 4wd w/143.5-inch wb) GM Silverado/Sierra 4.3L and 5.3L engines. This performance exhaust system fits both 2/4 Wheel drive models with 143.5 and 153-inch wheelbases and is manufactured from 409S stainless steel for years of trouble-free service. Features include 3.00-inch inlet pipe leading into a Flow FX ""straight-through"" muffler for great sound and maximum performance. The single 3.00-inch mandrel-bent tailpipe exits out behind the rear passenger side tire and is finished off with large 4.50-inch diameter black ceramic coated 304S stainless steel tip, giving your Silverado/Sierra that custom look that goes hand in hand with the deep performance sound of the Flow FX muffler. The system uses all the factory hanger locations and connections for an easy installation that you can do at home. Includes installation instructions and all necessary hardware."",""metadescription"":null,""productnotes"":"""",""installationnotes"":""Fits 2014-2018 GM Silverado/Sierra 1500 4.3L & 5.3L engines, 2/4 "",""updatedtimestamp"":""2022-01-10 19:02:44"",""updateddate"":""January 10, 2022"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""717857"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":1911,""customerid"":365980,""firstname"":""Matthew"",""lastname"":""Gamelin"",""rating"":""4"",""verified_owner"":1,""entrydate"":""April 26, 2022"",""title"":""2014 Chevy 1500"",""reviewtext"":""Let me start off by saying the kit sounds awesome. Not too loud, not too quiet. Just right. I deducted a star because of poor design of the hanger rods. The OEM hanger rods have a little nipple on the ends, which keeps the stock exhaust system attached to the hangers. The Flowmaster hanger rods have no nipple on the ends. I installed the system about two weeks ago and have already had to get under the truck 2-3 times to reinsert the hanger rods into the rubber hangers. Not impressed. regulations.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Introducing the new Flow FX® Cat-back exhaust system for 2014-2019*(*Classic body 5.3L, 4wd w/143.5-inch wb) GM Silverado/Sierra 4.3L and 5.3L engines. This performance exhaust system fits both 2/4 Wheel drive models with 143.5 and 153-inch wheelbases and is manufactured from 409S stainless steel for years of trouble-free service. Features include 3.00-inch inlet pipe leading into a Flow FX ""straight-through"" muffler for great sound and maximum performance. The single 3.00-inch mandrel-bent tailpipe exits out behind the rear passenger side tire and is finished off with large 4.50-inch diameter black ceramic coated 304S stainless steel tip, giving your Silverado/Sierra that custom look that goes hand in hand with the deep performance sound of the Flow FX muffler. The system uses all the factory hanger locations and connections for an easy installation that you can do at home. Includes installation instructions and all necessary hardware.",About Flowmaster,"Shop the complete line of Flowmaster products for exhaust systems, mufflers, and more that deliver the iconic Flowmaster sound. Available at Holley.com!",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS
