,{""name"":""Edge Juice w/ Attitude CTS3"",""partnumber"":""31502-3"",""upc"":""810065210173"",""shortdescription"":""2003-2004 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 - 5.9L Cummins Diesel"",""description"":""The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Juice with Attitude CTS3 is the ultimate inline performance module and digital monitor combo for 1998.5–2021 Dodge Ram Cummins trucks, delivering unmatched power, safety, and control in one complete system. With massive horsepower and torque gains, the Juice with Attitude is perfect for drivers who want more from their truck—whether it’s for daily driving, heavy towing, or pushing the limits at the track.

column1: What sets the Juice apart is its ability to deliver on-the-fly tuning adjustments directly through the sleek 5-inch CTS3 touchscreen monitor, giving you instant access to multiple power levels at your fingertips. Built-in safety backdowns automatically protect your engine and transmission under extreme conditions, making it one of the safest ways to add big power to your Cummins. The intuitive CTS3 monitor also provides full visibility with customizable gauge layouts, data logging, performance testing, and the ability to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs).

For those who demand even more, the Hot Unlock power level option unleashes massive torque and horsepower gains for competition or extreme performance builds with big injectors, upgraded turbos, and supporting mods. Yet, even in its standard form, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 is tuned perfectly for work trucks, tow rigs, and everyday drivers who want noticeable improvements in throttle response, drivability, and pulling power—all in an emissions-friendly package.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of diesel tuning innovation, the Juice with Attitude CTS3 remains the benchmark for Cummins performance, combining legendary power with industry-leading safety and control.",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

This bolt-on emissions-legal system fits RAM trucks with the 5.7L Hemi engine and features all mandrel-bent 409 stainless steel 3.00-inch tubing flowing into a Super 10\u2122 Series muffler and exiting into large 3.00-inch dual mandrel-bent tailpipes for maximum sound and performance. The system comes with two sets of tailpipe exits for you to choose from, either straight out the back under the bumper, or exiting behind the rear wheels, which is ideal for towing applications. The tailpipes are finished off with a pair of large 4.00-inch black ceramic coated stainless steel tips and the exhaust system is covered by our Lifetime Limited Warranty. Designed for an easy fit, this system includes all necessary parts and hardware for installation. column2: Instructions - 817936_InstructionsV3.pdf", Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,5,Emissions,"This part is legal for sale or use on Emissions Controlled Vehicles, Uncontrolled (Non-Emissions Controlled) Vehicles, and Racing Use Only Vehicles because it does not affect vehicle emissions and is not covered by emissions regulations.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"This Flowmaster® Outlaw® cat-back exhaust system is for 2019*-2024, 2026 (*New body) RAM 1500 trucks is perfect for maximum sound levels both inside and outside of the truck, with all of the performance benefits that you would expect from Flowmaster. This bolt-on emissions-legal system fits RAM trucks with the 5.7L Hemi engine and features all mandrel-bent 409 stainless steel 3.00-inch tubing flowing into a Super 10™ Series muffler and exiting into large 3.00-inch dual mandrel-bent tailpipes for maximum sound and performance. The system comes with two sets of tailpipe exits for you to choose from, either straight out the back under the bumper, or exiting behind the rear wheels, which is ideal for towing applications. The tailpipes are finished off with a pair of large 4.00-inch black ceramic coated stainless steel tips and the exhaust system is covered by our Lifetime Limited Warranty. Designed for an easy fit, this system includes all necessary parts and hardware for installation. Note: Fits 2/4 wheel drives with 140.5, 144.5 and 153.5-inch wheelbases.",About Flowmaster,"Shop the complete line of Flowmaster products for exhaust systems, mufflers, and more that deliver the iconic Flowmaster sound. Available at Holley.com!",SPECS,SERVICE PARTS,EMISSIONS,5,TECH RESOURCES,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

column15: ,{""name"":""Flowmaster Flow FX Cat-Back Exhaust System"",""partnumber"":""718100"",""upc"":""090127134917"",""shortdescription"":""Fits 2017-2026 Ford F250\/F350 Super Duty with 6.2, 6.8 and 7.3-Liter V8, Flow FX Cat-Back, Dual Side Exit, Stainless Steel Exhaust System"",""description"":""This Flowmaster\u00ae Flow FX\u00ae cat-back exhaust system for the 2017-2025 Ford F250\/F350 Super Duty trucks with the 6.2, 6.8 or 7.3-liter engine is manufactured using durable 409 stainless steel throughout and features 3.5 to dual 3.0-inch mandrel bent pipes for better exhaust gas flow. A Flow FX \""straight-through\"" muffler is used for an aggressive to moderate sound level and maximum performance. Maximum increases on the dyno revealed +11 hp and +15 lb-ft at the rear wheels. This system exits out both sides, behind the rear wheels with 4.50-inch black ceramic tips for added style and a custom look. The system uses all the existing factory hanger locations and includes installation instructions and all necessary hardware for an easy installation that you can do at home.  Backed by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty."",""metadescription"":null,""productnotes"":"""",""installationnotes"":""2017-2025 Ford F250\/F350 Super Duty with 6.2L\/6.8L\/7.3L-Liter engines. column2: Instructions - 718100_InstructionsV2.pdf", Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,5,Emissions,"This part is legal for sale or use on Emissions Controlled Vehicles, Uncontrolled (Non-Emissions Controlled) Vehicles, and Racing Use Only Vehicles because it does not affect vehicle emissions and is not covered by emissions regulations.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"This Flowmaster® Flow FX® cat-back exhaust system for the 2017-2025 Ford F250/F350 Super Duty trucks with the 6.2, 6.8 or 7.3-liter engine is manufactured using durable 409 stainless steel throughout and features 3.5 to dual 3.0-inch mandrel bent pipes for better exhaust gas flow. A Flow FX ""straight-through"" muffler is used for an aggressive to moderate sound level and maximum performance. Maximum increases on the dyno revealed +11 hp and +15 lb-ft at the rear wheels. This system exits out both sides, behind the rear wheels with 4.50-inch black ceramic tips for added style and a custom look. The system uses all the existing factory hanger locations and includes installation instructions and all necessary hardware for an easy installation that you can do at home.  Backed by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty.",About Flowmaster,"Shop the complete line of Flowmaster products for exhaust systems, mufflers, and more that deliver the iconic Flowmaster sound. Available at Holley.com!",SPECS,SERVICE PARTS,EMISSIONS,5,TECH RESOURCES,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

Vehicles, and Racing Use Only Vehicles because it does not affect vehicle emissions and is not covered by emissions regulations.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"This Flowmaster® Outlaw Direct-Fit Muffler system for the 2021-2025 Ford F-150 trucks with the 2.7, 3.5 or 5.0-liter engines is manufactured using durable 409 stainless steel throughout and features 3.00-inch mandrel bent pipes for optimum exhaust gas flow. A Flowmaster Outlaw Series muffler is used for an aggressive sound level and maximum performance. Performance increases on the dyno revealed an increase of 16 hp and 21 ft/lbs. at the rear wheels. This system connects directly to the factory dual tail pipes and uses all the existing factory hangers. Includes installation instructions and all necessary hardware for an easy installation that you can do at home. Backed by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty.",About Flowmaster,"Shop the complete line of Flowmaster products for exhaust systems, mufflers, and more that deliver the iconic Flowmaster sound. Superchips offers a PCM swap for the 15-UP HEMI 2500 6.4L trucks, but we're well aware that consumers are interested in other options to add performance. Pulsar is a brand new, innovative product that has been engineered to keep your PCM on the truck with no flash tuning, or removal of the computer itself, required. Pulsar is an in-line computer that connects directly to the vehicle PCM, with no additional wiring harness (do we have your attention The 91 octane tune really woke the big truck up!  Bonus is turning off the annoying MDS!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-09-26 19:39:27"",""updateddate"":""September 26, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32452"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3269,""customerid"":416005,""firstname"":""bones15830"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""4"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""August 27, 2021"",""title"":""Works great!"",""reviewtext"":""Product works great.  But just a FYI  to get it to fit on a 2018 Power Wagon.  You have to remove the covers on the plugs to be able to plug them into the tuner because they hit the Air Conditioning lines. But other than that it is Easy to install and program."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-08-27 14:46:33"",""updateddate"":""August 27, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32452"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3270,""customerid"":416006,""firstname"":""Clay"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""June 11, 2019"",""title"":""Great Product"",""reviewtext"":""This is a great product from installation to performance no troubles whatsoever met all expectations"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-06-11 19:45:02"",""updateddate"":""June 11, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32452"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3271,""customerid"":416007,""firstname"":""DarylAZ"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""April 26, 2019"",""title"":""Works as stated"",""reviewtext"":""I bought this a month ago and have been working through the different power levels, and I have to say that the unit works as it is described.  Gas mileage is better not outstanding but I didn't expect that big of a jump and it all depends on how heavy your foot is.....  The performance settings are amazing and you really have to watch what you are doing with the increase in the throttle response.  I like the change on the fly feature.  I had a little bit of a challenge on the install as the 6.4L ECM is in front of the air box with minimal space but it is doable.  It was worth the money to have these options and performance."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-04-26 17:14:10"",""updateddate"":""April 26, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32452"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3272,""customerid"":416008,""firstname"":""Destroyer1320"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""June 21, 2022"",""title"":""Awesome product"",""reviewtext"":""Please watch my review...on Destroyer1320 YouTube see what I think..."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2022-06-21 04:51:06"",""updateddate"":""June 21, 2022"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32452"",""feedback"":[{""customer_id"":488137,""feedback_type"":""helpful""}],""images"":[]},{""id"":3273,""customerid"":416009,""firstname"":""Jim C"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""October 6, 2021"",""title"":""Woke up my Hemi"",""reviewtext"":""I installed this product on my 2018 Ram 2500 with 6.4L Hemi and WOW! What a difference. Pulling my 38' Travel Trailer I had way more power and increased my mileage buy 3 miles per gallon. I would recommend this product to any Hemi owner"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-10-06 18:07:25"",""updateddate"":""October 6, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32452"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3274,""customerid"":416010,""firstname"":""firstclass903"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""4"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""December 9, 2020"",""title"":""My Pulsar"",""reviewtext"":""I have had the Pulsar plugged in now for a month or more and can definitely feel the difference in power. If you are buying this hoping to get better gas mileage well I havnt really noticed a difference in that. Easy to use and love being able to use it as I'm driving down the road"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-12-09 09:14:28"",""updateddate"":""December 9, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32452"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3275,""customerid"":416011,""firstname"":""Easydreamer"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""April 12, 2021"",""title"":""It really does what they say it does."",""reviewtext"":""I bought a Pulsar to help the throttle response on my 2018 6.4 Ram. Totally amazed how the performance increased. Throttle response is crisp. I pull a 35 foot 5th wheel camper and I am waiting to hit road. I have put a few miles on the test to performance of the Pulsar. All I can say is WOW....!!!!! I am impressed!"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2021-04-12 02:36:19"",""updateddate"":""April 12, 2021"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32452"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3276,""customerid"":416012,""firstname"":""Jon2018"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""November 1, 2020"",""title"":""Wow!"",""reviewtext"":""It shipped very fast even with the covid going on. installation was easy, I noticed right away a different in throttle response in performance mode. Towing mode worked awesome as well on my 2018 power wagon. I used to run one razor up north and would get 11 mpg but after the pulsar was installed I ran the same trip with 2 razors on a heavy equipment trailer my mpg went up to 13 also that was with new 35\"" tires instead of the factory 33\"" tires."",""updatedtimestamp"":""2020-11-01 12:05:41"",""updateddate"":""November 1, 2020"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32452"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3277,""customerid"":416013,""firstname"":""lizard62"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""May 7, 2022"",""title"":""easy installation"",""reviewtext"":""it was pretty easy to install, and easy to change modes. works great"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2022-05-07 08:15:33"",""updateddate"":""May 7, 2022"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32452"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3278,""customerid"":416014,""firstname"":""Hoov"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""3"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""March 23, 2019"",""title"":""Nice features"",""reviewtext"":""I bought it a month ago to improve on mileage and haven't noticed much difference"",""updatedtimestamp"":""2019-03-23 21:29:24"",""updateddate"":""March 23, 2019"",""needs_moderation"":0,""approved"":1,""response"":"""",""responsedate"":""January 1, 1970"",""isVariation"":0,""partnumber"":""32452"",""feedback"":[],""images"":[]},{""id"":3279,""customerid"":416015,""firstname"":""Chaosram"",""lastname"":"""",""rating"":""5"",""verified_owner"":0,""entrydate"":""July 10, 2019"",""title"":""Easy install"",""reviewtext"":""Super easy install and amazing throttle response. I installed earlier this week in my 2018 6.4 Hemi Power Wagon 2500.  Seems that in all the modes it shifts smoother and better fuel economy especially in the eco non mds mode. Throttle response is better, seems to hold gears better. BUT... the random P0335 CKP code and engine stalling with no notice is not desirable or safe especially with a loaded trailer. I know for a fact it is the PULSAR causing this and not the truck. It would be one thing if Diablo would stand behind their product but they will not return emails or technical support requests, also I have sat on hold for hours now (not at one time) to never have anyone answer the phone. Like I said when it worked, I really liked it, but sitting in a box in my shop is not the idea spot for $500.00+ tuner. I cannot recommend this to anyone. column2: Instructions - 75daa6ee71c914bf88bd6acc8e451f6ddb8c1dec.pdf", Larger Image,Does it fit my vehicle?,1,Emissions,"This part is legal for sale and use on Emissions Controlled Vehicles, in all 50 states, when used in accordance with the manufacturers application guide because it has a California Air Resources Board (CARB) Executive Order (EO) number.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"If you've shopped for performance upgrades for you '15-18 RAM 6.4L truck, odds are you've come to the realization that ""tuning"" these trucks is easier said than done. Superchips offers a PCM swap for the 15-UP HEMI 2500 6.4L trucks, but we're well aware that consumers are interested in other options to add performance. Pulsar is a brand new, innovative product that has been engineered to keep your PCM on the truck with no flash tuning, or removal of the computer itself, required. Pulsar is an in-line computer that connects directly to the vehicle PCM, with no additional wiring harness (do we have your attention yet?!).",About DiabloSport,"Shop the official DiabloSport site to view the Predator, inTune, and Trinity tuners and programmers for late-model GM, Ford, Dodge, Jeep, and Chrysler gas and diesel vehicles. ",VEHICLE SPECIFIC ATTRIBUTES,SPECS,EMISSIONS,1,TECH RESOURCES,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

,{""name"":""Flowmaster Outlaw Cat-Back Exhaust System"",""partnumber"":""818112"",""upc"":""090127130162"",""shortdescription"":""Fits 2020-2026 GM Silverado/Sierra 2500HD/3500HD 6.6L Gas V8, Outlaw Series, 3.50"" to Dual 3.00"" Cat-Back, Dual Rear Exit, Stainless Steel Exhaust System"",""description"":""This Flowmaster® Outlaw® Cat-back exhaust system for the 2020-2026 Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra 2500HD/3500HD trucks with the 6.6L gas engine, is perfect if you are looking for an aggressive sound level inside and outside of the truck, with all of the performance benefits that you would expect from Flowmaster®. Maximum increases of up to 9 hp and 9 lb.ft. over the stock exhaust at the rear wheels. Designed for the Crew Cab, Standard Bed (6.5 ft.) models only, this bolt-on, emissions-legal system features a stainless steel Outlaw series muffler and large dual 3.00-inch 409 stainless steel mandrel-bent tailpipes that can be configured to exit either dual straight out the back, or dual out the sides behind the rear wheels which is best suited for towing applications. The system is finished off with polished 4.00-inch stainless steel tips and is covered by our Lifetime Limited Warranty. Designed for an easy fit, this system includes all necessary parts and hardware for installation."",""metadescription"":null,""productnotes"":"""",""installationnotes"":""Fits Crew Cab with 6.5-foot bed length, 159-inch wheelbase only.

sale or use on Emissions Controlled Vehicles, Uncontrolled (Non-Emissions Controlled) Vehicles, and Racing Use Only Vehicles because it does not affect vehicle emissions and is not covered by emissions regulations.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"This Flowmaster® Outlaw® Cat-back exhaust system for the 2020-2026 Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra 2500HD/3500HD trucks with the 6.6L gas engine, is perfect if you are looking for an aggressive sound level inside and outside of the truck, with all of the performance benefits that you would expect from Flowmaster®. Maximum increases of up to 9 hp and 9 lb.ft. over the stock exhaust at the rear wheels. Designed for the Crew Cab, Standard Bed (6.5 ft.) models only, this bolt-on, emissions-legal system features a stainless steel Outlaw series muffler and large dual 3.00-inch 409 stainless steel mandrel-bent tailpipes that can be configured to exit either dual straight out the back, or dual out the sides behind the rear wheels which is best suited for towing applications. The system is finished off with polished 4.00-inch stainless steel tips and is covered by our Lifetime Limited Warranty. Designed for an easy fit, this system includes all necessary parts and hardware for installation.",About Flowmaster,"Shop the complete line of Flowmaster products for exhaust systems, mufflers, and more that deliver the iconic Flowmaster sound. Available at Holley.com!",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,

,{""name"":""Evolution CTS3 2020-2023 GM 2500/3500 6.6L Gas"",""partnumber"":""85453-K"",""upc"":""850058611389"",""shortdescription"":""2020-2023 GM 2500/3500 6.6L Gas - Unlocking and flashing"",""description"":""The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate flash tuner and digital monitor for 2020–2023 Chevy Silverado HD and GMC Sierra HD trucks with the 6.6L L8T gas engine, delivering proven power gains, improved drivability, and advanced control in one sleek package. Every kit comes with the Edge Locksmith tool, allowing you to unlock your truck’s ECM safely through the OBD-II port. Once unlocked, you gain access to preloaded, emissions-friendly calibrations tailored for daily driving, towing, fuel economy, and performance—giving you noticeable horsepower and torque improvements where you need them most.

At the heart of the system is the industry-leading CTS3 5-inch touchscreen monitor, providing live data, customizable gauge layouts, and built-in diagnostics to read and clear DTCs. Beyond tuning, the Evolution CTS3 offers an impressive range of adjustable features, including tire size recalibration, speed limiter changes, and more so your truck performs exactly the way you want.

The Evolution CTS3 also sets itself apart with advanced transmission tuning support, giving you the ability to optimize shift strategies for heavy towing or aggressive driving. The result is smoother shifting, improved throttle response, and better towing performance for the heavy-duty work your truck was built for.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of tuning expertise, the Evolution CTS3 for the 6.6L L8T gas engine is the smart upgrade for HD truck owners who want affordable power, advanced adjustability, and the industry’s best digital monitor all in one package.

A PC and our downloadable Update Agent software will be required in order to complete this unlock and tune process

**Device can unlock and tune only one vehicle. Once the ECM is unlocked and flashed, the flash can be returned to factory settings, but the Unlock process can not be reversed. If VIN lock and ECM Unlock has been completed, device is November 23rd, 2020.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"The Edge Evolution CTS3 is the ultimate flash tuner and digital monitor for 2020–2023 Chevy Silverado HD and GMC Sierra HD trucks with the 6.6L L8T gas engine, delivering proven power gains, improved drivability, and advanced control in one sleek package. Every kit comes with the Edge Locksmith tool, allowing you to unlock your truck’s ECM safely through the OBD-II port. Once unlocked, you gain access to preloaded, emissions-friendly calibrations tailored for daily driving, towing, fuel economy, and performance—giving you noticeable horsepower and torque improvements where you need them most.

column1: At the heart of the system is the industry-leading CTS3 5-inch touchscreen monitor, providing live data, customizable gauge layouts, and built-in diagnostics to read and clear DTCs. Beyond tuning, the Evolution CTS3 offers an impressive range of adjustable features, including tire size recalibration, speed limiter changes, and more so your truck performs exactly the way you want.

The Evolution CTS3 also sets itself apart with advanced transmission tuning support, giving you the ability to optimize shift strategies for heavy towing or aggressive driving. The result is smoother shifting, improved throttle response, and better towing performance for the heavy-duty work your truck was built for.

Backed by Edge Products’ 20+ years of tuning expertise, the Evolution CTS3 for the 6.6L L8T gas engine is the smart upgrade for HD truck owners who want affordable power, advanced adjustability, and the industry’s best digital monitor all in one package.
A PC and our downloadable Update Agent software will be required in order to complete this unlock and tune process

**Device can unlock and tune only one vehicle. Once the ECM is unlocked and flashed, the flash can be returned to factory settings, but the Unlock process can not be reversed. If VIN lock and ECM Unlock has been completed, device is non-returnable",About Edge,"Edge Products specializes in high-performance tuning, monitoring, and diagnostic devices for truck and SUVs. Designed to optimize power, fuel efficiency, and overall drivability Edge Products offers user-friendly interfaces for both Diesel and Gas applications.",SPECS,EMISSIONS,TECH RESOURCES,,VEHICLE APPLICATIONS,,YEAR,MAKE,MODEL,ENGINE,SUBMODEL,REVIEWS

Features include all stainless steel construction, mandrel-bent tubing, and a race-proven Outlaw muffler for great sound and maximum performance. This system is designed for all who need instant gratification, since it can be installed in less than 30 minutes, uses the factory hanger location and delivers big sound and power. vehicle emissions and is not covered by emissions regulations.",See Emissions Details,OVERVIEW,"Designed as a direct-fit replacement muffler, this Outlaw system fits all 2019-2024, 2026 RAM 1500 new body style trucks with the 5.7L Hemi engine. The Outlaw muffler delivers a deep and aggressive interior and exterior tone that will get you the attention you crave, while letting that Hemi power shine. Features include all stainless steel construction, mandrel-bent tubing, and a race-proven Outlaw muffler for great sound and maximum performance. This system is designed for all who need instant gratification, since it can be installed in less than 30 minutes, uses the factory hanger location and delivers big sound and power. Includes easy to follow installation instructions.  Notes: Fits all 2/4 wheel drives and wheelbases, with either a factory single tailpipe or factory dual tailpipes. Requires some cutting to the factory exhaust system for installation.",About Flowmaster,"Shop the complete line of Flowmaster products for exhaust systems, mufflers, and more that deliver the iconic Flowmaster sound.
